11111.content:
This is a story about a young man Justin Yuy.

Justin stands below average height at 4’6", having a slim build and weighing around 123lbs, and while short Justin was relatively handsome. With short black hair, hazel eyes, and features that many described as being cute on account for his short size.

And even though Justin was short he was 17 years old and was still attending high school. Sadly he lives alone on his farm, and has lived alone for most his life. Justin’s parents work in multiple countries through the world and they would rarely come home to visit, and because of this Justin has lived alone most of his life.

However, things changed when he received a letter in the mail that made his life a bit more interesting.

Unbeknownst to the boy his parents signed their house up for the newly instated, Interspecies Exchange Bill, which permitted as Interspecies to move in and live in their house. The idea of having a stranger in his house did bother Justin, but after meeting with the Exchange Officer, Justin felt a little better knowing that every Interpseice creature had a thorough background check and that he was entirely safe.

After the initial inspection of his home, and with slight reconstruction, the young boy was suddenly eager to meet who his new
On the day of arrival, just stood outside his house and wondered what sort of monster was coming. He didn’t know much about the person coming to live with him, but he hoped that they were nice.

Just saw a black car pull up front of his house and watched as Agent Smith, the officer he first met, step out of the car and smiled at Justin.

“Hey shorty good to see you again” the word shorty cut Justin down to the point turning white. He hated being called short.

“Morning Miss. Smith, do you really have to call me that?” he asked as the long legged woman approach him.

“Sorry, I call people as I seem them” she said with a reassuring smile that reminded Justin of how nice of a person that Agent Smith was.

“Now are you’re ready to meet your new house quest?” she asked as Justin looked over at the car waiting for his new loft mate to come out, but out of the blue Justin heard a horn and watched as a large truck appear behind the black car.

“Are they in there?” Justin asked as he pointed to the large moving truck.

“Indeed” Agent Smith said as the door to the back of the truck open up and reveal and green skinned troll woman.

“Allow me to introduce you to Sarah, she is a Minatour from Greece, she will be staying with you until further notice” Agent smith explained as Justin felt his jaw hit the ground as watched the minatour girl step out of the back of the truck and approach Justin.

In less than a second Justin studied every feature this woman had to offer. She clearly tall, standing near 8’0 feet, and Justin could see that she was a muscular woman, with very large breasts, and long white hair. As a Minotaur, Justin saw that she had a pair of large horns on her head, cow ears, a cow tail, and her legs have hooves instead of feet and are covered with fur.

Her clothing consists of overalls, with no shirt, and a cowbell tied around her neck. Justin casually extend his arm out to the Sarah who eargly reached out and began to shake Justins.

“It’s so nice to meet you, I’m so excited to finally meet you” Sarah said with a bright smile on her face, a smile that somehow melted Justin’s heart.

“The pleasure all mine” Justin said with a sheepish grin.

"Okay, now allow me to introduce you to the next one" Agent Smith explained as Justin felt his jaw drop in shock.

"There more!"

1112111.content:
(Leon, Miia) (Note: Duel Monsters will also be used in this story)

Name: Leon Midnight di Selene Seiryu.

Age: 18.

Gender: Male.

Blood-type: A+.

Birth country: Japan.

Residing country: Japan.

You are part of the once mighty Seiryu clan. A clan that was founded in the beginnings of the Edo Era in 1603 an whose sole dedication was to protect the world, sometimes in sight and sometimes from the shadows, and has done so through out the centuries. However, 13 years ago, when you were on your fifth birthday, the clan's village was invaded by a very powerful demoness named Akuha Bloodriver, her generals, Naraku (Inuyasha), Makoto Shishio (Rurouni Kenshin), Sailor Galaxia (Sailor Moon), Boa Hancock (One Piece), Caesar Clown (One Piece), Akua Shuzen (Rosario+Vampire), Seta Sojiro (Rurouni Kenshin), Camula (Yu-Gi-Oh! GX), Sartorius (Yu-Gi-Oh! GX) and Paradox (Yu-Gi-Oh! Movie that features Yugi, Jaden and Yusei) and their army of demons and monsters. They killed almost everyone. With you being the only survivor. And you only survived, because Bloodriver thought it would be amusing to see you struggle to survive alone in the world. However, what they didn't know, was that you were never alone. For, ever since you were born, you were able to see and communicate with the spirits of the Duel Monsters. You had a bond with all creatures on the village's Zen Garden. But there was five creatures with whom you shared an even deeper bond, as they were there, besides your mother the day you were born. Those creatures were Blue-Eyes White Dragon, Red-Eyes Darkness Metal Dragon, Stardust Dragon, Carbuncle Ruby and Dark Magician Girl. Also, while the village was destroyed, the underground vault of the village had somehow remained intact. Thus you were well off.

The Seiryu were a clan of powerful warriors and magicians. Many times they aided the Regents of Japan in battle and had supported them when needed. Some members of the Seiryu were known and recognized as some of the greatest warriors and magicians of all Japan. And it was considered an honor to be trained by one of them. So great was their reputation. However, the Seiryu didn't answered anyone. No. For them to fight for someone, that someone had to earn their respect. For the Seiryu took principles and honor very seriously. And so, in the times they were summoned, they answered to the Regents ONLY.

For instance, If someone like, say, a snobby noble, decided they wanted to command the Seiryu or drive them around, they would soon find out that they were biting more than they could chew. The Seiryu wouldn't harm them. No. Instead, they simply let the nobbles do whatever they wanted to and ignored them. After they tired, they would give all and every bribe or monetary gift the nobbles had tried to buy them with to the Regents. The Seiryu made a point to keep their motto. Which was, "Power is not for oneself. It's for the others. It is to be used to the good of everyone. Not for personal gains. It is to be used to protect the innocents. Not to judge and punish."

And so, they used their power and wealth to help and protect the less fortunate. Many books and poems were written in their honor, narrating their stories and their deeds. However, if one were to search for history records and other documents about them or tried to find their village, they would find nothing. That would be so because The Seiryu Clan had requested the regents that, if something were to happen to them, that every document about them should be erased. They asked this because evil doers or simply ambitious beings could try to use the contents and information in the documents to cause harm to the people. And the Seiryu would rather be forgotten than allow such tragedies to happen. And so, the Seiryu and the Regents had divided all the knowledge they had in books and other documents in half. Each side had kept one half and decided to place a special spell that was linked to every Seiryu that already existed and to every newborn. That is, so long as the regents knew of their existence.

The effect the spell would have, was that if the Seiryu ceased to exist, all and every document related to the Seiryu would automatically be destroyed. However, in the end, and unbeknownst to the regents, only half of the documents were destroyed. Because, while the regents spell wasn't linked to Leon, the clan's spell was. Thus, since there still was a Seiryu breathing, the documents in the clan's vaults and library remained unscathed. However, since the regents at that time didn't knew about that, they thought that the Seiryu clan no longer existed. It was indeed a very dark, tragic and sad day in the history of Japan when the land lost the Seiryu clan.

Leon's existence was kept a secret, even from the regents, not only because of the Duel Monsters bonded to him, but also because of the great power he possessed. A power so great, that in order for you to survive, they had to place 7 Seals on your body as a baby. The Seiryu believed that each and every person was guarded by a Constellation. However, unlike most people, Leon was born in an extremely rare alignment of the Pegasus, Dragon, Sagittarius, Aquarius, Pisces and Scorpion constellations during a Blue Moon. The alignment of 6 constellation happened only every five thousand years and always with different constellations. Due to you having so many guardian constellations, your armor was a mix of all six.

----------------------------------------

The year is 2015. Back in 2012, the World Government revealed that monsters did exist. Several species as a matter of fact. However, at least to you, it seemed odd that most were female. And, through negotiations from all countries, an agreement was reached. An agreement named "Cultural Exchange Between Species Act". Since then, several human families all over the globe have taken in these creatures to live with them, in order for humans and monsters to reach a peaceful co-existence. Nowadays, one could see many monsters going out with their host families. That is due to one of the most important rules of the "CEBSA". Which is "A monster cannot go outside without at least one member of their host family. Failure to comply may result in deportation". There is another rule that is extremely enforced: "Monsters cannot harm humans and humans cannot harm monsters. Failure to comply will result in deportation and will also result in prison of the offender". Which was good. Because, while most accepted and welcomed these new, mysterious beings, there were others that despised them for being different and wanted them gone.

Although you have money enough to buy the most luxurious and spacious mansion, you decided to settle for a nice and comfortable two-stories house. It had two bathrooms, two bedrooms, with one of them being a suite, kitchen, living room, a garden and an underground training room. So far, you hadn't hosted a monster-girl. Until one day, when a woman wearing a black jacket, black pants and black shades appeared on your front door. Another female was besides her. But, unlike the woman, she was a Lamia. The woman identified herself as Agent Smith and told you that you had been selected to be the host family of the Lamia. Shyly, she introduced herself as Miia. You let both of them in and you all sat down on the living room. You asked if they wanted something to drink. Smith-san quickly agreed and asked for coffee. You sweatdroped at how quickly she accepted. Miia, on the other hand, didn't answered. Thinking that she hadn't heard you, you went to her side and bent down on your knees. You shook her elbow and, apparently, she had been lost in her thoughts, for she jumped a bit. You repeated the question and she requested a cup of tea.

Later into the night, after showing Miia around the house, the reforms were done (with Smith-san paying, of course), explaining all the rules too you and Miia and "asking" for dinner, Smith-san left. Leaving you and Miia alone. You picked up the dishes and went to rinse them. As you did, you noticed that Miia was quiet and seemed to be trembling. You went to your room and grabbed a spare blanket you had in your closet and covered Miia with it.

Surprised by the action she looked up at you. And you gave her a warm smile.

"I hope we'll get along Miia. And that your stay here is pleasant."

Miia felt her heart stir. No one, aside from Smith-san and her family, had ever been kind to her.

"Good night, Miia."

"G-good night."

You went up stairs, changed yourself, brushed your teeth and went to sleep. Unaware that a certain Lamia had sneaked in while you were sleeping.

In the morning, you woke up a a soft feeling on your face and to your lower half being slightly restricted. You opened your eyes and turned around as best as you could. Only to receive a face full or breast flesh! You blushed crimson and pulled back your face, and you found out why you were restricted. You heard a giggling sound and turned your head up to look at the source.

"Miia?! What are you doing here?!"

"Ohayō, Darling!", she said, while giving you a small lick on the nose.

As soon as she said that you knew that your live had gotten quite a lot more interesting.

11131.title: Original Power/Powers you come up with

111311.content:
Lance Ryland, was a 24 year old traveler. Originally from the United Kingdom, he had been traveling on his own since he was 14. Hearing about the Interspecies Exchange Bill, he had decided to pay a visit to the land of the rising sun to see first hand the changes that were being set in motion. Mostly it was underwhelming. For the most part, the cities were unchanged. A few stores here or there were designed with Liminal in mind but mostly the city was like that of any other place he'd visited.

"Sigh, I don't know what I was expecting. The exchange bill passed not that long ago; change takes time," he spoke aloud with his Yorkshire accent.

"I can't believe they're letting these freaks into the country," a pedestrian not far from Lance complained. Having taken to world travel, Lance had studied a multitude of languages. Japanese, while difficult, was one of the languages he had learned.

"I know right. Given enough time they'll be flooding the streets. I'm just glad it hasn't happened yet," another said, conversing with the first.

"I wouldn't be so sure. I saw a ton of them not to far from here."

"You're kidding?"

"Nope. They were so gross, and they came in so many bizarre shapes and sizes."

"Where was this place?" Lance asked as he approached the two men.

"Speaking of bizarre shapes and sizes. Who the heck are you?"

"I'm sorry to interrupt. My name is Lance, I was hoping to see some Liminal while I was here," he explained.

"A tourist. No wonder he's so funny looking."

Lance looked at his reflection in a window. Being 6' 2", he was tall most anywhere he went but was especially so in Japan. He had a lean, muscled build do to his long hours of walking, hiking, and climbing in his travels. His black hair was long and dingy do to a lack of maintenance, and he had grown an unruly beard. An overly full backpack was being carried on his shoulders that held all of his essential belongings. The clothes he wore, while not raggedy, were designed more for function than fashion. With a grey shirt, black cargo pants, and brown climbing boots he was definitely not dressed for high society.

"I guess I'm a bit worse for wear," the Brit smiled.

"Whatever, I saw them about 5 miles that way," the less than pleasant local informed while pointing in a direction.

"Thank you," Lance said polity and began walking in the direction given.

Half an hour passed noon, Lance had reached the area he'd been told about. It was an area outside of town that almost resembled a park, but without the fountains and benches. There was a large, cuboidal building, the only one around, with a sign out front. Black Lily Advanced Materials Laboratory.

"That's a bit odd," the wanderer thought as he stroked his beard. He climbed the shallow stairs up to the building and saw that the entrance and the walls surrounding it were entirely glass. Pushing open the doors, Lance entered and was graced with a very nice greeting area with a fountain that fed into plants, a fish tank seated in a wall filled with exotic fish, large paintings and a bulbous chandelier.

"Can I help you?" a lady at the reception desk asked.

"Pardon my intrusion. I just heard this was a place Extraspecies gathered..." Lance began before being cut off.

"Oh, are you an Extraspecies looking for work?" the lady asked in a chipper voice.

"Oh, no, no. I'm completely human. I guess when people begin thinking you aren't human that means it's time to shave," Lance chuckled before a realization hit "Extraspecies work here?"

"They do. However, unless you are an Extraspecies or have an appointment, I'm going to have to ask you to leave," she said in a firm but non aggressive voice.

"I understand, I didn't mean to bother you. I just heard that I could meet some Liminals near here. I shouldn't have intruded."

As Lance turned to leave a voice called out across the lobby, "Wait." Turning back around he saw a man approaching him. His hair was black and combed but without product in it so strands here or there poked out giving him a semi professional look. In fact, that was the word to describe his entire appearance. He wore a tie but it was loose and the top button on his shirt was undone. While he wore a nice, long sleeved shirt and slakes, they were unironed. Lastly he wore a lab coat, that was hanging freely from his form. "So, you came here in search of Extraspecies?" the man asked as he adjusted his glasses.

"Yes. I travel a lot and have spent my life trying to have as many unforgettable experiences as possible. The Interspecies Exchange Bill is going to change how our world works and that means that I no longer have to travel to see the extraordinary. Japan is the first country to institutionalize these kinds of laws and that's why I came here," Lance explained as a wave of memories washed over him.

"I see. You're really interesting you know that? Most people are trying to avoid change, yet you seek it out. If you'll indulge me a minute, I think I can offer you an experience no one else has had."
111311.title: Story 1

1113111.content:
Lance had been sitting in the back of the van for at least two hours. After 10 years of travel he had become used to such things but the fact that the president of Black Lily Research was sending him so far away was a bit troubling. Lance had been given the opportunity to live with multiple Extraspecies on a ranch owned by the company. The law stated that Extraspecies had to live with a human for them to legally live outside of a government facility, but this was not Lance's home, nor was he even a citizen of this country. Skirting the law, is how the president had described it, but this whole situation still felt wrong to Lance. Of course he still agreed, the opportunity was too enticing to refuse but that didn't mean he was going to be entirely comfortable with it.

Preforming the techniques he learned to avoid sore or numbness from long car rides Lance had failed to notice the shift from smooth pavement, to gravel, to dirt. It was a large bump that sent his head into the roof of the car that alerted him to the change.

"Sorry," came the drives apology.

Lance rubbed the bump on his head as he growled in anger. "It's not his fault," he internalized and began looking out the window. The dirt road carved a path through a thick wooded area. The forests of japan were quite beautiful in Lance's opinion and this one was dense. Perfect for keeping unwanted eyes from snooping, the president said. 10 more minutes of driving and the car entered a clearing. The ranch wasn't too large all things considered. Nothing like other ranches that he had seen in Australia and North America. Along the fencing, Lance could see cattle and sheep freely roaming. Closer to the house, he could see vegetables like carrots, cabbage, turnips and potatoes growing. Of course, the most interesting thing he saw was a Centaur herding some cattle.

Standing at a lofty 6' 9", the exquisite equine was something to behold. Her hair was a silky golden blonde but tied up into a bun and covered by a bandanna to keep it out of the way. Her skin was tanned from prolonged exposure to the sun and the fur on her lower half was a bay color. Her legs however were white and had extensive feathering. Of course, her legs were not her most visually captivating feature. Her breasts were massive, double J cups. As she ran, they bounced significantly. Lance wondered how she was able to run at all.

Feeling as if he was gawking Lance looked away, a sense of shame overtaking him. The Centaur slowed as the cattle began to behave and looked over to see the van approaching the barn. Her blue eyes, followed the vehicle before closing with a sigh.

Stopping outside of the barn, the van parked and Lance stepped out of the vehicle. Placing his backpack on the ground, he immediately began stretching to insure he wouldn't become sore.

"You almost done? I got work to do?" Came a powerful female voice. Lance looked to his right only to be greeted by two monstrous breasts. These were even bigger then the pair the Centaur had. R cups to be sure and upheld by only overalls that seemed to just barley contain them. Looking up to see the owner of such magnificent mammaries, Lance saw that a Minotaur stood before him. She had short hair that liked to flare outward. It was of two colors. Black in the back and a greyish brown in the front, mostly her bangs. A pair of horns spread outward horizontally from her upper skull before curling inwards and then shooting up right at the tips. Two black streaks that ran along her check bones adorned her face. She had light brown skin weather it was from tanning or her natural tone, Lance couldn't surmise. "Let me guess. You've never seen a Minotaur before. Well quite gawking, I need to show you around, explain your duties, and get everything else I need done around here," she informed with authority.

"Right, I'm sorry. My name's Lance Ryland. It's nice to meet you," he said holding out a hand to shake her's.

"Name's Alexandra. You can call me Alex," she introduced as she took his hand to shake it. "Powerful grip. That's good. You look strong for a human. That'll make things easier. Grab your bag and follow me," she instructed before turning around.

It was then that Lance noticed she had a bovine tail and hooves. Grabbing his bag he took a deep breath and thought, "This is going to be interesting."
1113111.title: Life On a Farm

11131111.content:
"This place was built by Black Lily with us Extraspecies in mind," Alex explained as she led Lance through the facilities. "You'll find the doors and hallways in the house and barn much taller and wider than you're used to. There are currently six Liminals working on this farm. They're all women, I expect you to behave yourself." She turned her head back toward Lance to give him a partial scowl.

"Absolutely. Even if the Exchange Bill didn't forbid such things, that's not why I'm here. I am curious though, why is it only women work here?" the Brit inquired.

"We produce certain products that require an all female staff," Alex informed vaguely. With a raised eyebrow, Lance followed Alex into the barn itself. There he saw two Pan gathering sheep into a pen. "These are Elena and Iris," Alex introduced as the two got closer.

Elena was 5' 5" while Iris was 5' 4". Both girls had short, white hair and curled rams horns. Patches of fluffy wool stuck out from the overalls both girls wore, especially around the neck and shoulders. The girls had teal eyes that seemed filled with timidness but a sense of honest joy. As Lance and Alex came within a few feet of the girls Iris grabbed hold of Elena's arm causing their F cup breasts to squish into one another.

"Hi, I'm Lance. It's nice to meet both of you," he said with a soft voice and a warm smile. The two Pan relaxed a little and Elena began to smile.

"It's nice to meet you too. You're the new hire right?" she asked in a high, sweet voice.

"I am. I'm excited to work with you all," Lance assured and held his hand out to shake their hands. Elena took it and shook gingerly. Iris took some coursing from her fellow Liminal but she eventually took the human's hand. Of course, it was a very limp hand shake and she quickly retreated afterwards.

"Don't worry. Iris is extremely shy. Give her time. She'll come around," Alex informed.

Alex than began to show Lance around the barn. The cow milking station, the hay storage, etc. Leaving the barn, Lance couldn't help but feel as if he was being watched. From out of nowhere a body landed in front him and attempted to sweep his legs out from under him. With fast reflexes, he avoided to attack and backed up to see his attacker. His face relaxed when he saw it was a satyr.

"He's quick. That's good, I like a challenge," the girl said as she brushed some hair behind her ear. Lance felt the hair on the back of his neck tingle and he once again jumped away.

"He's very perceptive too. I hadn't even made a move yet," another female satyr purred.

"Sigh. Lance, this is Aphra and Dite," Alex introduced as she pinched the bridge of her nose.

Both girls were 5' 7" and had short, dirty blonde hair. Goat horns and pupils as well as fur around their necks. Both girls had H cup breasts, slim waists, and plump bottoms. The overalls they wore were barley secured allowing Lance more then adequate view of their bosoms, but he assumed that was on purpose.

Dite went to stand next to her fraternal twin sister and both girls looked Lance up and down.

"Tall, solid stance and posture. Good muscle tone and plenty of energy from the looks of it," Aphra began.

"Hair, skin tone, and skeletal structure means he's not a local. Defensively from Europe, but that grizzled look he's got going means he hasn't been keeping up with himself. His scent has so many lingering smells that he definitely travels a lot," Dite added.

"Adventurous, that's great. We can have lots of fun with him," Aphra smiled as she licked her lips. Before anyone could make another move, Alex grabbed both Satyrs by the head and lifted them off the ground.

"Don't you two have work to do?" the Minotaur asked in a sinister tone.

"We were just taking a small break to meet the new guy," Dite stated with obvious terror.

"Well, get right back to work. All you have to do is put us down," Aphra assured.

"I'll put you done," Alex said as she lifted the girls even higher "Way over there." Alex threw the sisters across the field causing Lance to panic. However, both girls manages to flip in the air and land without harm.

"That was a little harsh don't you think?" he questioned.

"Those two are trouble. You can't underestimate them or you'll be in way over your head before you now it," Alex clarified before continuing the tour.

Alex showed Lance the locations of the laundry room, the kitchen, the bath house, the recreation room, and the first aid center all while informing him of the rules of the ranch and everyone's individual duties.

"You have two main jobs. Preparing three meals a day and taking care of the laundry. Neither of those things will take you all day, so when you finish each of those tasks you'll find me or one of the others and we'll tell you what else needs to be done. You're going to be our extra set of hands, so your tasks won't be the same every day. This job will require a lot of menial and physical labor so try and get as much sleep at night as you can. I don't expect you to conform to your new sleep schedule immediately but we can't wait a week for you to adjust. We've been backed up on work, so your first few days are gonna be rough. After that, however, things should settle down and you should find the work evening out," Alex listed as she walked Lance down a hallway. "This is your room. You're lucky. Iris insisted on sharing a room with Elena so you get to sleep in an actual bed. Otherwise you would be sleeping on the couch until the president could get a construction crew out here."

The room was sparse. Only a bed and a side table with an alarm clock on it. There were two tall windows in the room that gave a nice view of the forest. In the right corner there was a closet for clothes and to the left, a private half bath.

"Unpack and change into your work clothes. Dinner needs to be ready by 6 but other than that your free for the day," Alex said and walked away.

Lance put his bag down on the floor at the foot of the bed before sitting down on the mattress. It was the softest bed he had slept on in years. With a deep, relaxing sigh, the Brit took a moment to enjoy the feeling. After a few minutes he turned to look at the clock. 3:24 PM.

"Dinner doesn't have to be ready for hours. And while I should get started soon, there should be enough time for me to take care of something," Lance thought as he reached for his bag.
11131111.title: Orientation

choices: Join them in the bath house
111311111.content:
The Extraspecies girls walked into the dinning area that was separated from the kitchen by a half wall and counter. A mix of groans and stretches were emitting from the girls after a long day of work.

"Oh good, you girls have great timing, I just finished the first round of food," Lance said as he laid out another platter of food. "I read a synopsis of each of your eating habits from books the president gave me. I hope you enjoy your dinner."

"Wow," Elena gasped as she looked at the feast set before them. It was mostly simple dishes. A large tossed salad, beef and vegetable soup, roast beef, etc. "This looks great. Thank y..." Elena stopped short as Lance turned around.

Once gruff and dingy looking, the traveler was now clean shaven and with clean and spiked hair. "I'm just glad I was able to get dinner ready in time," Lance smiled "I would've hated to let you guys down on the first day."

"You shaved," Alex stated.

"Yeah. Ever since I got to Japan, people have been commenting on my hair, so I decided to clean myself up.

"You gave yourself a hair cut too?" Aphra asked.

"You'd be surprised how much money you can save by learning to cut your own hair. I keep a razor and a pair of scissors in my pack at all times. But enough about me. You should eat. I'll have seconds ready in just a few minutes." The girls formed a line and grabbed plates before serving themselves dinner. Lance stopped the Centaur, whom was last in line. "We weren't introduced. I'm Lance, it's nice to meat you."

"I'm Ailith," the equine greeted with a Scottish accent.

"You're Scottish? That's interesting, what part of Scotland are you from?"

"Clydesdale," she answered simply.

"Cool. I visited there when I was young. I loved the trees there, and the hills at sunset were beautiful," Lance reminisced.

Ailith, looked down in sadness. "I'm gonna eat dinner now," she said as she walked away. Lance watched as she walked away with puzzled concern.

"I hope you like it," he attempted to recover. "What happened? Did I offend her somehow?" he wondered as he returned to the stove.

"This food is great," Elena cheered.

"Better than the food we were eating before anyway," Alex clarified.

"He can cook, and with that hair cut he's turning out even better than expected," Aphra commented.

"Agreed," Dite concurred. A single stare from Alex caused both sister to begin eating faster in an attempt to avoid her wrath.

Iris swallowed a spoon full of soup and smiled.

Not long after, the girls had finished off the first batch of food, but Lance was ready with seconds. Three rounds of food passed before the girls were sated.

"That was fucking great," Dite burped as she rubbed her belly.

Covering her own burp with her hand, Alex stood up and instructed. "alright, put your dishes up and hit the bath house. We gotta be up and ready to play catch up tomorrow morning."

Lance had already begun cleaning the pots and pans he had used to make dinner.

"Will you be joining us in the bath house?" Elena asked as she placed her dishes in the bin.

Lance stopped and looked at the Pan with shock. "I don't think that's a good idea. Besides I still have a ton of dishes to do so I better..." he said as he began vigorously scrubbing a pot.

"Are you sure? I think it would be a good opportunity for us all to get to know one another," she offered.
111311111.title: Dinner Time

1113111112.content:
"I appreciate the offer, but I really need to finish my tasks. Can't slake off on the first day," Lance stated with a red hue on his cheeks.

"Okay, if you're sure," Elena said as she turned around.

With a sigh of relief Lance continued to clean the dishes. It took about 45 minutes but Lance was able to clean and put away all of the dishes. Cracking his knuckles, the new hire dried his hands before turning off the lights. His eyes caught a glimpse of the clock that was hanging on the dinning room wall. 8:02 PM.

"I should probably take a bath and head to bed," he thought. Swinging by his room to grab some essentials, Lance then made his way to the bath house. As he expected, the bath was empty. One of the things Lance enjoyed most about Japan was its large soaking bathes. Of course, since this one was designed for Liminals it was extra wide and deep. The water was so warm that there was a thin fog throughout the entire chamber. Along the left side there were little shelves to hold belonging and on the right were shower heads and stools for washing. In the far corner there were jets that shot water out of the floor as well a detachable shower head with an extra long hose. "Must be for Ailith to clean her under side," he summarized.

Picking a showering station, the human began to clean himself; making sure that he cleaned his freshly cut hair thoroughly. He used a towel to scrub his skin clean of all grim that he may have accumulated. A variety of scars were scattered across his body and he winced every so often when he ran the towel across them. Taking no more time then necessary, Lance finished showering and gathered his things. Debating whether or not to soak in the bath, Lance stood in the chamber staring at the water. A gasp caused him to look at the door. Standing at the entrance was Iris, whose whole face was red. Frozen for only a moment, the pan quickly covered her eyes before running out of the room.

Not knowing the proper etiquette in this scenario Lance decided to simply get dressed and leave. Lance walked passed the other girls rooms on the way to his. Passed one of them he heard Iris hyperventilating. He didn't know if it was a good idea to try and help. It was his fault she was like this. Which meant he could either make it worse, or he could help her feel better.
1113111112.title: First Night on the Farm

11131111122.content:
Lance rubbed the back of his neck before letting out a deep sigh. As much as he wanted to help, he hand no real idea of how to do that. He found it best to simply give Iris space and head to bed. Wake up time is early so it's best to get to sleep as soon as possible.

After opening his door, Lance placed his dirty clothes in a hamper next to the closet and laid down on the bed. Wearing only a pair of well worn basketball shots, the human stretched before yawning and pulled the blanket over his body. "I'll have to find a way to make Iris feel comfortable around me if we're going to work together. Maybe I can ask Elena about that," he thought as he tried to fall asleep. It didn't take long for his minor fatigue and the soft bed to whisk him away to the realm of dreams.

The next morning Alex knocked firmly on Lance's door. When no response was given she knocked louder. "Hey newbie, get up. There's work to be done," she spoke through the door. "Trust me, it'll be better for you to get up than to force me to get you up," the Minotaur warned. With a sigh, Alex opened the door and shouted "get up you lazy..." Her anger was halted as she found an empty room beyond the door. "What the?" she wondered. It was 5:00 AM, Lance's bed was made, and there was no sign that Lance had slept there. "Did he bail?" she asked herself before turning around and closing the door.

Making her way to the kitchen to start breakfast herself, she was surprised to find Lance already hard at work. "Alex great timing," he said as he spotted her, "any ideas for breakfast options for the other girls. I can only think of oatmeal and apple crepes."

"Uh, we haven't really made anything fancy for breakfast before," she answered with a slight confusion.

"Waking up can be daunting, especially if you know you have a long days work ahead of you. A delicious breakfast is a good motivator to get up and start the day," Lance said as he cracked some eggs into a boil.

"Right. I'll go and make sure the girls are awake. You... keep doing what you're doing," the ranch head informed before turning around and walking away.

"Okay," Lance responded as he continued cooking.

An hour later, all the extra species girls were present and the food was ready. Lance made plates for everybody and greeted each girl with a warm smile and a hello. That is until Iris, whom was at the end of the line. "Good morning Iris. I'm sorry about last night. I didn't mean to make you feel uncomfortable," he said as he loaded a plate with some food and the special crepe he made just for her. Iris blushed, looked away, grabbed the plate, and dashed toward the table to sit next to Elena.

"What did he mean by sorry about last night?" Dite asked the silent Pan.

"Iris walked in on the new hire in the bath house last night," Elena informed as she put a hand on her friends to calm her.

"Did she now? Do tell us all the juicy details. His build, his trim, his girth," Aphra insisted causing Iris to bury her blushing face into her hands.

"That's enough of that," Alex asserted.

"Oh come on. You can't tell me you're not the least bit interested about what's under the hood," Aphra probed Alex.

"I'm more concerned about finishing breakfast so we can get started on today's chores," the Minotaur stated.

"Aren't you worried the newbie will hear you asking about this?" Elena questioned the sisters.

"He's more than welcome to answer these questions himself," Dite said and turned to look over her shoulder. Much to her chagrin, Lance was busy making seconds and hadn't heard any of the conversation. "Oh well, I'm sure we'll find out for ourselves tonight in the bath house," she sighed.

"Actually, I offered for him to join us in there last night, but he refused," Elena informed.

"Really," Alex asked as she turned to look at the human as well.

"He said he wanted to finish up his tasks first. Said he didn't want to let us down on the first day," the pan elaborated.

"Playing hard to get, or is he just a shy virgin?" Aphra pondered as she licked her lips.

"That's enough of that. Finish eating and let's get to it," Alex said as she got up from the table to grab more food.

Breakfast continued and before long, Lance was left alone in the kitchen to finish dishes. Thanks to better planning, Lance was able to finish dishes quickly and headed toward the laundry room to start on his next task. The sight of the laundry room was a shock. Overalls were flung everywhere. Baskets upon baskets were overflowing with towels and other clothing. The smell was also alarming. He wondered if laundry had ever been done here. With a deep breath, Lance got to work and began to sort, clean, and then hang each of the clothes to dry in the sun. This took longer than he would have liked and caused him to cut into his prep time for lunch. Rushing back to the kitchen he began to prepare several dishes that would satisfy and give the girls the energy to finish the day. Lunch was much faster than breakfast. Very little talking took place as the girls mostly wolfed down the food before heading back out again. The human once again washed dishes before heading outside to gather the dried clothes from the lines. He then folded and placed the clothes inside of hampers. Ailith's skirts were a bit of a challenge thanks to their size and the wind but Lance was able to manage. After taking the baskets of clean clothes and placing them outside of each girls room, Lance looked at a clock and saw it was 2:00.

"Alex said I should find her or another of the girls after I finish my tasks for the day," Lance said to himself.
11131111122.title: Head to your room

112.content:
(Miia: http://orig11.deviantart.net/64de/f/2015...)

You are Sasuke Uchiha, the last survivor of the once mighty Uchiha Clan. Born with incredible power, your family had taught you to control that power at an early age. How to harness it, and how to keep it in check. However, before you could truly train to hone your skills at age 8, your clan was attacked by demons. Your brother, Itachi had taken you to a safe house and attached seals all over it, telling you to come out ONLY when the seals have deactivated, which you obeyed to the letter. However, once you walked out of the safe house, you saw the entirety of your clan butchered, your mother, brother, and father dead in the street. You were overwhelmed with emotions and you swore revenge. Seven years later you were well taken care of due to the fact the Uchiha had a considerable bank account, and as the sole heir to it, you had great funds at your disposal, yet you didn’t go nuts with it by any means. You bought a simple home, with a training grounds for you to train, a little Zen Garden to relax, and the necessities. You had a special room for some gear that you knew one day you would need again. However the world changed when the government revealed monsters were in fact real, and they began to make an “Interspecies Exchange Bill.” which would allow monsters to pursue cultural exchange. Though three years have passed since then, not once have you been a host family to such monsters, and you continued to live your life normally. However you were soon surprised with an Interspecies Coordinator named Smith had arrived at your home with a Lamia named Miia. You were quite surprised by this, and quickly learned the law of this bill. Later on that same day, Miia seemed cold, and you decided to get her some very warm blankets, and welcomed her with a smile and open arms. And while you were fully happy to accommodate her, especially since the government remodeled the house to make it more comfortable in each room for her, due to her tail was about 6 to 10 feet in length, but what you didn’t expect is that one act of kindness, she had fallen in love with you REALLY quickly, and the instant you heard her call you “Darling” you knew your life was about to get much more complicated.
112.title: Chaos Prologue

1121.content:
(You Miia Smith) (All dialogue that I italicize are the character's thoughts.)

A few days later, you woke up to the morning sun and the sound of your alarm clock, Once you turned off the clock you noticed Miia was right there beside you, sleeping. “Miia. It’s morning, wake up.” “Five more minutes….no, wait until I warm up five more degrees.” “Wait, Miia, what are you doing in my bed?” “It was too cold to warm myself up. I thought you could warm me up, darling. Lamias are cold-blooded.” “I’ll draw you a bath then.” you said sitting up. “Give me a minute.” “Nope.” She used her tail to grab you and bring your face right into her chest. “I want you to warm me up, darling. You’re so warm. I can feel your body heat warming me up.” As she said this the top she wore moved a bit exposing even more of her chest. “Her Oh hell! Calm down Sasuke. Don’t get any weird-” your thoughts were cut off when Miia coiled around you, and tightly for that matter. “Whoa, whoa! My neck! She’s cutting off my carotid artery! Time out Miia! I’m gonna pass out! I give up, I give up!” You thought tapping her coils twice “Darling, don’t be so rough.” she said half asleep. “You kidding me?! I need to break out somehow.” Despite your efforts you couldn’t get free. “No good. She squeezes tighter wherever there‘s a gap. If I don’t escape soon, I’m as good as done. Must…escape…!” you thought grabbing the end of her tail which caused her to gasp. “D-Darling, not the tip of my tail…” “Have I found her weakness?” you thought and scratched at it a bit with your index finger, and she gasped once again. “Its extremely effective, it might be the only way out of this.” you said as you continued to use force on her tail, stimulating it as her coils loosened up. “D-Darling, no more…” “Almost there…” “Darling!” you were so desperate you made a hard twist on that tail with a tight grip and she gasped once more and started to drool, you quickly took in a lungful of air. “I thought I was toast” Miia once again force your head into her chest, but she was painting with pleasure. “I…I can’t take it…I…” “Huh?” “I’m coming!!!” she yelled as she tightened around you with a climax, and you nearly passed out from the sheer force of it. About 2 minutes later Miia finally got out of your bed. “Oh, fine. I’ll get up. You were so feisty this morning.” she noticed you were just laying there. “Darling?” “Give give me a minute or two.” you said catching your breath.

After a bit you drew up a bath for Miia, and you couldn’t help but comment on the sheer size of each room now, though your thoughts were interrupted by Miia. “Is the bath ready?” she said walking in. “Uh, yeah. I just-" you covered your nose as it bled seeing Miia naked. “Thank you, Darling. I’ll take the first bath.” As she got in a good amount of water flowed over the sides. “It’s so warm. Japanese bathtubs are so great. I read that Japan has hot springs, too. I’d like to go to one with you someday.” she said sliding to the side closest to you. “Well, um…” your nose let out a burst of blood. “What are you looking at? So naughty.” You had to get out of there and fast. “I-I’m going to get breakfast ready now…” Before you could escape Miia grabbed you with her tail and pulled you into the bath. “Miia! You’re in the bath! You don’t need me to warm you up!” “I know hot springs have something called mixed bathing, too.” Her breasts pressed to your back. “Wait…Miia..” “So we can bathe together.” “Miia, given that its prohibited, I don’t think that’s a good idea.” “Is mixed bathing that bad? Do hot springs have such naughty practices?” “No, but…” “Then let’s experience mixed bathing together.” she said as your hands were bound and was trying to remove your shirt “After all, I came to Japan to experience its culture.” “Wait, wait, wait!” “I don’t want to do mixed bathing with anyone but you. I want my first to be…” Before she could do anything you got free for a moment and turned the shower on cold, and she gasped in surprise. “It’s so cold! My body heat!” As she moved you fell right back in the bath with her. “What are you doing Darling?!” You got out of there and looked at her “This facility doesn’t offer mixed bathing.” you said walking off. “Aww! You’re no fun!!” As you got out of the bathroom, you had one hell of a nosebleed and started to hit your head against the wall to snap out of it. The law with this bill is not easy to follow, especially when Miia gets your blood boiling like that. Once you calmed down you went down to make some breakfast.

Of course you decided to make plenty of eggs since that's Miia's favorite dish. "Man, a few weeks ago, I never thought my life would be like this." "You can say that again." A woman said behind you, causing you to jump. "Good morning, Sasuke Uchiha. What's wrong? have you forgotten me? I'm your Interspecies Coordinator, Smith." "Yeah I know who you are. What are you doing here?" "Could I get breakfast too?" "You came here to eat?" "I'm also here to make sure you're not engaging in any prohibited activities. Anyone who hurts the girls, who are here for the purpose of cultural exchange, will be punished to the fullest extent of the law. Since you, as her host, are ignorant of the law, I came to check on you." "Ignorant? Now hold on. You're the one who accidentally brought Miia here. I'm not her intended host family." "I don't recall." "Talk about lax! Anyway, I would never hurt her." "Hurting her can me popping her cherry too." she said as he got behind you. "I wouldn't-" "You've got genitals. You could do it if you wanted to. Has she ever approached you? The girls are rather passionate. However, damaging the purity of her species' representative at human hands would be a diplomatic issue. If you did this, you would be arrested and Miia deported. it's sad, but it's the law." You stayed silent for a moment. "So did you have sex?" "No!" "But surely you've thought about it. Her lower body's a snake, but she's got a nice body, big breasts, and she's beautiful. Above all, she's madly in love with you. And besides, you don't look like you could put up much of a fight" She said getting close to you, almost in a teasing manner. "Hey..." Before you could react Miia grabbed you by the neck and pulled you toward her with her tail. "Hey! What are you doing? You'll pay if you lay a finger on my darling, Smith-san!" "He's got it rougher than I thought." "Are you listening?" "I was just joking. I have other matters to see to, so i'll be going." As she walked she stopped and looked at you. "Darling-kun, please refrain form any prohibited activities. Bye." As she left Miia held you close to her. "Uh, Miia? you'll get cold again if you don't dry off." "Are prohibited activities that big a deal?" "Huh?" "Back when I first arrived here...Since lamias have the lower body of a snake, most people hate us on first glance. So I was afraid you wouldn't accept me, but you accepted me with a smile. It made me so happy." "I see your species on TV all the time, you aren't scary." You were pinned to the ground gently as she coiled around you and got on top of you. "What's prohibited makes no difference to me. Because I don't care what you do to me. You could even hurt me if you want." Miia..." Miia used the tip of her tail to unzip your paints and she force it into your underwear. "I wouldn't mind...if you gave me my first permanent scar. After all, I love you." she said leaning in to kiss you, but you tilted your head back. "I'm sorry. I can't." "Why? Is the law that important?" "That's not what I meant." Your face turned a bit blue there. "My arm...is about to snap..." She gasped and before she could release you, your shoulder was dislocated. "YEOW!!!" "DARLING!!" Smith came back shortly and helped get your shoulder back into place. Miia crying and saying "I'm sorry" multiple times. Your life sure is a roller coaster now.
1121.title: Chaos Begins (With a Lamia)

11211.content: After you got your shoulder back into place, Smith told you that you were going to take Miia around town, which she would easily take as a date. She game you the ground rules, like you cant leave her alone, and of course, no love hotels. After getting into something else, and waiting for Miia to get dressed the two of you were off. “A date. A date. Today I’m on a date with my darling. A date!” she sang excitedly. You were just trying to keep your cool. “Let’s go, darling. Let the date begin!” she said grabbing your head with her tail and slithering off with speed. “Miia try not to break my neck here!” you thought. Through-out the course of the day, the two of you went to all sorts of places, starting with a nice restaurant, then she took you to an arcade and kept playing the claw machine until she got a stuffed snake. Of course she took you in a photo-booth and while it was a bit small, you did get a little bit crushed by her coils, as was to be expected. But when the two of you went to a karaoke club, the private room wasn’t that big, and again you got crushed. But needless to say, she was having a blast. “This is so much fun. I thought Japan would be more formal, but it has a lot of fun places. But I’m a little disappointed everything was so small and designed for humans. I wish we could have done karaoke together.” “Well private booths are pretty small. And not everything has been adapted for all species yet, so it can’t be helped.” Miia spotted a special store. “Look, darling. There’s a store for all species. Let’s go inside!” she said as she practically dragged you there. “Hey don’t pull.” When the door opened you were a little surprised by the type of store it was. “It’s…a l-lingerie shop?!?! I think I’ll wait outside.” “No.” she said grabbing you with her tail, pulling you in. “Smith-san said we have to be together at all times/” Miia approached a clerk after she let you go. “Excuse me. Do you have anything for lamias?” “Over there. Take your time.” “Thank you.” “I feel so uncomfortable…” you said to yourself. “Does Miia even wear underwear? How??” your thoughts were interrupted by Miia. “Darling, which do you think looks better?” You moved back a little surprised. “I don’t wear bras too often, so I don’t know.” she said opening her shirt, causing your nose to bleed. “I don’t know anything about bras either, why don’t you try them on??” “Try them on? Good idea.” she said dragging you in there too. “You don’t need me in here you know!” “We have to be together at all times. So I want you to look at them and pick which ones you like.” she said dropping the bras in your hands, causing you to blush. “I want to wear whatever you like. I want you to love me even more. So look carefully before you choose.” she said as she showed off parts of her body. You blushed and just blurted out the answer. “They…They all look great! Let’s get them all!” you said rushing out. As you sighed with relief, you noticed something triangular in your hand. “What is this? Silicon? A Nubra? No, it’s the wrong shape. The back seems adhesive, and it’s warm.” “D-Darling…” “Huh?” “I’m sorry for dragging you into the changing room, so give me back my panties.” “Eh?” “Darling, you’re such a pervert!” she said taking the object back with her tail. And soon you got an image in your head of how that actually works. “So you do wear underwear.” “Dummy!” she said while slamming you with her tail hard enough to send you flying out the window. After a bit, the two of you are walking down the street. “Sheesh, darling...only perverts play with panties, you know.” “I didn’t mean anything by it, I didn’t even know what it was!” She giggles. “But if you’re that curious, I’ll show you, darling.” “I told you…” Just then two by-standers hear that. “Whoa! What is that? Damn! She called him darling!” “Talk about gross!” they said laughing, Miia got frustrated and soon tried to smack them with her tail, but you took the hit instead. “Darling! Why did you?” “Miia, remember the law. Humans cannot harm other species, but the reverse situation also applies.” More people started to show up and take pictures, Miia wanting privacy, though sadly the only thing available was indeed a love hotel. You sat on the bed nervous as all hell while Miia was bathing, but then she came out in only a robe. “This bath isn’t as big as yours, but it’s still pretty big.” “M-Miia, are you okay?” “Yeah. I feel better now. But this is a hotel right? I don’t have any of my stuff.” “Its fine, we wont be here for very long at all.” “Even though it’s a hotel? Then what do people do here?” “I wonder!” you said playing dumb. “And what is this?” she said pulling out a condom. “Just leave that there!” you said embarrassed. She did as you asked and you sat there for a bit. “I guess human’s still don’t like us.” You looked at Miia confused. “People are only nice to us because it’s required by law. Are you being nice to me because you’re afraid of being arrested, too?” “No, I…” Miia removed her robe and fell back on the bed. “Look, darling. I'm not scary. See how defenseless i am? I wouldn’t do anything, even if you hurt me. Are you still afraid of me?” “Miia…” Before you could say a word, Smith burst through the wall with some troops. She was prepared to take you in, until she saw you. “So how did you find us?” “Don’t underestimate out skills on getting information. But in truth, we used twitter.” You were just dumbfounded. Once Miia got dressed you all went downstairs and the same couple saw you and they started mocking Miia again. But before she could attempt to hit them again. You charged them and landed a punch to the guy’s face so hard, it forced the two of them through the glass door. Back at your house, Smith patched up your arm and told you that they settled things with the couple outside the courtroom, but you knew it was because Smith intimidated them. “About that cut on your cheek…” “I tripped and fell on it.” “That’s fine then.” she said leaving, and Miia came into the room. “Darling. Why did you do that?” “I jumped in front of your tail to keep things from getting bad. Its no big deal.” “That’s not what I meant.” “Look, if I do it, it’s just a normal fight. Hitting guys like that isn’t worth you getting deported. Besides…you may be of another species, but you’re a girl first and foremost. I couldn’t forgive them for being so mean to a girl. That’s all.” Miia smiled having tears of joy in her eyes. “Darling…Darling!” she said tackling you to the ground, nuzzling your chest. “It‘ll always end like this…huh?” “I’m so happy! You really see me as a girl! Shall we pick up where we left off, then?” she said revealing her chest, and started removing your clothes. “Wait! We just barely avoided you getting deported!” “It’s okay, I’m ready for my first time now!” Smith came back before it got out of control. “Oh, Darling-Kun, what’s for dinner tonight?” both of you were sitting upright with your backs to her. “What are you doing Smith-San?” “What am I doing? I’m hungry.” “You’re so demanding!” She started to whine at how the negotiations wore her out. “We’re having curry, if you don’t mind.” “That’s fine.” “Just when things were getting good…” “Oh Miia-chan, you left these at the hotel.” she said holding her panties. Miia let out an embarrassed scream and you just rolled your eyes. Knowing that things would never be dull here.
11211.title: An Eventful Day

112111.content:
(Papi: http://shinoharaa.deviantart.com/art/Pap...)

The next day you were doing some laundry with Miia’s help, and you couldn’t help but notice how happy she was today. “You’re in a good mood Miia. Something happen?” “Oh, Darling. You’re so shameless!” she said repeatedly hitting your back in excitement though it did sting a bit. “Of course I’m in a good mood. You were so cool yesterday.” From the look on her face it was easy to tell she was fantasizing of your response to her last night. “If you’re ever in danger, I’ll protect you.” she said going inside to get more clothes. You went to follow her but something grabbed you and you hit the back of your head, knocking you out. Miia heard this and rushed to you. “Darling?” At that moment she saw a harpy holding you in her claws, and flew off with you. “Darling!!!”

A few minutes later you woke up hanging in a tree. “Huh? Where am I?” “You’re awake?” You looked seeing the harpy that grabbed you. “Who are you?” “Papi! I’m Papi. Papi the Harpy.” “Papi Harpy Papi?” “Harpy the Papi.” She stumbled around with this for a while and you decided to get things back on track. “Anyway, where is your host family? You’re not supposed to be alone.” “That’s why I brought you here.” “You kidnapped me for that?” She noticed an ice cream truck and you quickly lost her attention. “Huh? What’s that? Is it food?!” she said excitedly. “Listen to me!” She grabbed you out of the tree and dropped you to her feet, and then started to pull you to the truck but after about three steps she looked at you in confusion before taking a step back. “Who are you?” “She’s a birdbrain!” It took a minute but you finally got back on track and bought her some ice cream and sat with her on a bench. “I'm not allowed to go out until I memorize the Interspecies Ceremony.” “You mean ‘Interspecies Exchange Bill.” “It’s too difficult for me to remember though. So, when the terminator wasn’t looking…” “Coordinator you mean.” “I ran away!” “That can’t be good!” “No worries. I've run away a few times, but I didn't get in trouble. But they said next time I ran away, they'd incest me. What does that mean?” “I think you mean they would ‘deport” you! You’re in huge trouble!” Her face grew pale. “Trouble…” she then accidentally dropped her ice cream. “I haven’t even had a single bite yet! It's so hard to hold!” she said crying. “Aww. With hands like that, it’s no wonder.” You held out the ice cream pop to her “Here, you want this?” “Really?! Okay, thank you.” she said not even taking it, but just eating it right on the spot. Needless to say, this didn’t look good. You asked why she didn’t take it and she’s afraid to drop it again. Though you were getting some looks and you weren’t comfortable with it. When you took it from her mouth, a good amount of it got on her. “I-I’m all sticky…” she said coughing. “ Then, let’s get you cleaned up, come on there’s a faucet over here.” you said moving in a slight hurry, but when you turned around you noticed she was naked and getting in the fountain. “What are you doing?!” “Bathing!” “No, I meant your clothes!” “Don’t you know you’re supposed to bathe naked?” “A birdbrain just made fun of me. Just get out of there!” She ignored you and started to bathe in the fountain. “This feels great! It’s so nice that you have baths in the city!” It didn’t take long for a crowd to gather. “This girl is absolutely clueless about human society. Even as a bird you can only be so bird-brained.” she then grabbed you and pulled you in the fountain. “Don’t just stand there! Play with me!” “Keep me out of this!” “I found you!” You turned your head to see Miia, and she was pretty ticked. “You bird brat! You kidnapped my darling, and now this?! I’m so jealous!” “What are you saying?!” She got right into Papi’s face and started going off. “I want to steal away my darling and elope with him, too! You make me so jealous, it can't be legal!” “What?! You want to fight?” Both of them were right in each other’s face. “Hey, both of you calm-” You were cut off by Miia grabbing Papi, and you as well. “You bird brat! I’ll make chicken soup out of you!” Of course Papi clawed her shirt tearing it, and you cot scratched too. “What did you say? What was that about chicken boobs?” “What are you talking about?” “What are you talking about?!” “Both of you are putting on quite a show with- huh? No one’s looking?” Then you and the girls noticed why, a little girl was stuck in a high tree. Papi volunteered to help by pecking her down until she falls, but she was weighed down by her wet wings. Miia started to climb the tree and when she accidentally startled the girl, she fell and Miia tried to grab her, but missed. Papi caught her with her body as she jumped but she couldn’t fly and when she landed, she saw you had cushioned their fall. “G-Good work, Papi.” you said giving her the thumbs up. As the mother got her child people clapped for Papi, but as you stood with Miia she let out a few tears “I tried too…” “It’s okay. I know. Good job.” you said getting the leaves from her hair. But then a cop showed up too later when called for the little girl. When he asked Miia and Papi about their host families, you stood up for Papi, which both she and Miia were touched by, but then when you were asked for the papers you were in a bind until smith showed up, and you all went back to your home.

“So how did you get Papi’s papers so fast?” “I already had them.” “Huh?” “I couldn’t find a family that would host a repeat runaway. So I was on my way to have her stay here.” “Wait- that means…” “Papi-chan. This is your new home.” “Really?!” “Huh?” “He’s the master of the house, so make sure to listen to him.” “Yay! Yay! Yay!” she said kicking her legs in glee. “Wait, can they both stay here at the same time?” “Why not?” “Smith, you really are careless aren’t you?” “Papi-chan, don’t run away again.” she said with a wink. “It's okay! I don’t understand complicated stuff, but i did learn one thing. I just need to stick with my master from now on, right? Take care of me, Master! Hey, Master, let's take a bath! Let's pick up where we left off! Come on, come on, come on." she said pulling you to the bathroom. “Don’t pull! And, actually…” you looked at Miia not sure how she’d react. “Why not? Darling, please keep Papi-chan company.” “Okay.” “Come on.” “Don’t catch a cold.” “Miia-chan, you’re taking this surprisingly well. I thought you’d object.” “I-it’s no big deal. I'm a little upset a nuisance has found its way into the home i share with my darling... But Papi-chan's a child. Also, she's a child. And most of all, she's a child. An adult like me can handle her.” “Oh my, Papi-chan’s your age actually.” She got shocked at this development. “Harpies evolved to have smaller bodies so they could fly, so they're often older than they look.” Miia quickly rushed to the bathroom and broke in, and you were slammed between the wall and the now detached door. “Darling, never mind! I’ll keep her company!” It didn’t take long for them to start bathing. “Just to be clear, Darling is my Darling. If you lay a finger on him, you will pay.” “I don’t have fingers.” As they talked, you thought to yourself “Can my body survive this crap?” After a while you were pleased to see them sleep together, Papi’s warmth keeping Miia out of your room for the night, but when you went to get a drink you knew you had to restock ASAP.
112111.title: Papi the Harpy

1121111.content:
(Centorea/Cerea)

The next day you went to the store to restock after Papi and Miia cleared out the fridge the other night, talking to how you were going to keep yourself to a monthly budget you’ve had for so long, when something slammed into you and you rolled right into a pole. “I can't believe we actually met. It must be fate! My name is Centorea Shianus. I'm a member of the dignified centaur race. Are you the one destined to become my master?” she stopped for a moment when she realized you were semi-conscious and helped you up, even helping pick your items up again. Giving a quick call to Smith, she once again just asked you to take care of her before she hung up to sleep. “She’s so careless.” “Anyway, Japanese spells are no joke.” “Spells?” “If you charge into an intersection, the one you run into is your soul mate. It’s an ancient spell, isn’t it?” “If you did that you’d just cause a traffic accident. Someone could have been hurt.” “I see.” she says handing your bag back to you. “And I’m not your soul mate. That’s also not a spell. It’s a manga cliché, and an old one at that.” “Wh-What? I knew I should have put toast in my mouth?” “Where did you learn that one? And why are you looking for your sole mate like this anyway?” “Well, because…” the conversation got interrupted by a man on a scooter who snatched a woman’s purse. He about ran you over but Centorea grabbed you and pulled you close. “Damn you. Committing more crimes?” “I can’t breathe….” She looked at you and noticed you were in her chest. She let go and moved back. “I’m sorry.” “That’s the guy who’s been snatching purses around here lately.” “What? As a proud member of the centaur race, I cannot ignore this. I swear upon my blade, I will capture him! But, according to the Interspecies Exchange Bill, I cannot touch him. That’s why I’ve been looking for a master to fight alongside me.” “Aren’t you already violating the Weapons Control Law?” She quickly grabbed your arm. “It can’t be helped though. It matters not if you aren’t my master. Come with me.” she says as your arm touches her breasts. “I get it, I get it! I’ll ride you.” you said as you were about to get on her back, but she responded with a kick that you just barely dodged. “That was too close!” “What are you doing?! I’m not a horse! If you aren’t my master, then cease your rude behavior. Unbelievable. Japan’s spells are really useless.” she said crossing her arms her face red. “Then what do you suggest?”

The thief checks his prize as he rides the scooter, but Centorea catches his attention, and you’re holding onto her sides. “Thief, come quietly. Otherwise, you will taste the weight of your crimes and the edge of my blade!” She looked at you as she ran forward. “Touch me inappropriately, and I’ll throw you off, got it?” “Then slow down!” This quickly turns into a wild chase, the thief first using water jugs to try to slow her down, but that blade just cuts right through them. “Is that the best you can do?” You were blushing pretty bad due to the fact you could see through her shirt. She noticed that fact too and covered herself, giving the thief a chance to go down a steep ramp. “You think you can get away so easily?” “Wait, you aren’t seriously going to-” you were interrupted when she just jumped into the air and landed on a truck, before jumping off it and is right next to the guy, her blade as his neck. “You wont escape. Hey, I need you to..” She just now noticed your hands were at her breasts trying to get a grip even though her wet shirt makes it harder, now she was trying to get you to stop. “Where, do you think you’re touching you idiot?!” “if you keep kicking, I’ll-" you were almost thrown off but clenched your arms around her breasts. “Y-you’re doing this on purpose aren’t you? I swear you will pay for this later.” You once again lost your grip and accidentally opened up her shirt, which made the biker lose control and crash, however Centorea froze up like a deer in the headlights, and you both crashed into a wall. You were buried under a pile of boxes as Centorea caught her breath. She tried reaching for her blade but the thief got it since she dropped it earlier. As he tried to slice her, you shielded her with your own body, your own instinct taking over. “I’m dead…”

*Later*

…or so I thought. So it’s a replica huh?” You said as you were talking to Smith on the phone, your injury being a cut across your body, but nothing to worry about. As you and Smith talked, you told her about the chase and she asked if you tried to ride her. “Uh, why?” She explains how basically, finding a master is like marriage to a centaur, and forcing one to let them ride them is like rape. You noticed Centorea lingering in a door and you quickly hung up and quickly got on your hands and knees. “I’m so Sorry Centorea! I had no idea how important it was, I didn’t mean any harm.” You looked up to see her kneeling before you as well. “Instead of Centorea, I want you to call me Cerea. That's what my close friends call me.” “Huh?” “I'm the one to blame. I got you caught up in that fight with my selfish sense of justice. On top of that, I hurt you.” “No, it’s not like I tried to refuse. You don’t need to be so considerate.” “Nonsense!” she said grabbing your hand and put it on her breast. “Can't you feel how my heart is pounding? I can sense my destiny! This is just like the meeting of the Greek hero Heracles and the wise Chiron! Japanese spells are impressive. I truly have met the man destined to be my master.” Your expression turned into one of surprise. “Since I arrived in this country...No, since I was born, that was the first time anyone's sacrificed themselves to protect me. Therefore, I, Centorea Shianus, acknowledge you as my master, and swear my lifelong loyalty to you.” You let out a surprised gasp. “Master, will you accept my loyalty?” “C-Cerea…” Just then Miia and Papi walked in. “Darling, did you get another girlfriend?” “Master, I’m hungry!” “Darling? Who are these girls? This is improper Master!” “Darling, how did you hurt yourself?” “Is dinner ready yet?” You let out a groan. Though after you cooked, the three of them talked. “Listen, not that I’m here things will be different. My master comes first.” “I always put my darling first.” “Me, too.” “Then can I get some help with the housework?” you thought as you cleaned the dishes.
1121111.title: A proud Centaur

11211111.content:
The following day, Smith was going to pick up Cerea’s homestay papers and Papi was trying to learn the Interspecies Exchange Bill, and Miia did help out a bit, though she did try to pull a fast one with saying the one who has stayed the longest is highest in rank, which Cerea didn’t allow her to do. Though just as Miia was talking about the fact humans and non-human species cannot harm each other, you walk in with a horseshoe imprint under your left eye. Naturally Miia wasn’t happy about it. “Easy Miia, I can explain. I was going to get you a bath to warm you up so you wouldn’t need me again, but I accidentally walked in on Cerea. I honestly didn’t think she was in there, so the fault is mine.” “N-Not at all. I had worked up a sweat from my morning run. If I had locked the door, this wouldn’t have happened. I’m sorry.” “It‘s okay, I‘m used to it.” Miia separated the two of you. “Darling, you're always defending Centorea! Centorea, hurry up and fill out your homestay application!” “Alright.” “I swear, centaurs are so violent. He only saw you naked!” “What? How dare you ignore your own faults? Lady Smith told me everything. I heard you dislocated his shoulder.” “I just couldn’t contain my emotions….” “In contrast, my master jumped in front of a evildoer’s blade to protect me!” “Well, my darling beat up some delinquents to protect me!” The two of them started going at it and you ended up getting a slap from Miia’s tail again. But before you could intervene, you noticed Papi have a mental overload. Needless to say, the Exchange Bill was extremely confusing to her. “My head feels so hot, I want to take a bath.” “Then go take one.” “Let’s take one together, Master!” “Why not ask Miia or…” You continued to watch them argue on how far one has gotten with you. “On second thought, you’re better off with me.” As you made a cool bath for Papi, you also showed her the new swimsuit Smith got her, though it was a school one. You helped her get into it but your hand did touch her breast, and when she gave you a look, you jumped in the bath to cool off, which Papi laid right on top of you on her back, causing you to chuckle. After giving a comparison to otters, Papi compared the two of you as siblings, and explained how there are only female harpies, and she never knew what having a brother was like. “I guess I don’t mind being your big brother.” She then grabbed your hand putting it on her breast. “Let’s get closer as siblings. My heart jumped when you touched my chest, I want to feel that again.” she tried to kiss you but you resisted. “Siblings aren’t like this!” “You’re resisting me? Fine then, I’ll have to use force!” Just then Cerea came in and shot arrows at Papi pinning her to the wall, but she didn’t hurt her. “Unbelievable. I've been tolerant because i believed you to be a child, but you’re my age? I wont allow you to behave this way.” “Nice shot…” you said getting out of the bath. “Master, please get on my back.” “Huh? Alright then.” Miia tried to stop all this but Cerea just trampled her. “Papi should cool off, given some time.” She said as she sped up, which forced you to grab onto her breasts again.

It didn’t take too long before the two of you ended up at the park when Centorea finally stopped running. “Are you alright, master?” “Yeah, I’m fine. The wind from riding on your back dried off my clothes.” “Really? In that case, could you, let go, please?” You realized where your hands were and you let go. “S-Sorry, it wasn’t on purpose.” “N-No, it’s fine. For one who serves you, it’s not a serious problem.” “Serves me? You’re exaggerating.” She then started to go on about how her people are proud warriors, which you can relate to in that sense. “But this is Japan. I know centaur culture is important to you, but you could let your hair down a little.” “I could never.” “You should take advantage of the Interspecies Exchange Bill. That’s why you came here. Isn’t there anything you want to do?” “Anything I want to do?” She then looked at a couple for a moment. “Um, I…No, never mind.” “Don’t be shy.” “My hand.” “Your hand?” “I was hoping you’d hold my hand…” “Huh?” “I’ve only ever held swords and bows, so I thought…I just thought that’s what girls do in human society. There’s no deeper meaning. No, as one who serves my master, that was an unbecoming outburst. Just pretend I never-” “Just relax.” you said softly as you grasp her hand. The entire area was quiet. “Cerea?” You looked at her face and it was actually very cute. “Cerea?” “D-Don’t look. Even I don’t know what I look like right now.” “Yeah, but…” “I told you not to look!” Just then both of you were startled by Miia falling out of the sky, causing Cerea to pull you close. “What’d you do that for, Papi?!” “You told me to let you down.” “I didn’t tell you to drop me!” “What are you two doing here? You said yourself that you’re not allowed out alone!” “It’s fine if no one finds out!” Miia’s eyes widened seeing your face in her breasts. Cerea herself failed to notice that until now. “Centorea!” As she tried to explain this, Miia grabbed you pulling you into her chest and started arguing with her, and then Cerea pulled you back, but then Papi got involved and you felt like you were in a tug of war. The three of them were just about to use force and Smith got out her gun to tranq them before it got out of hand. “Hey that’s enough!” But before you could stop them, the three tranq’s meant for the girls hit you in the back. “Oh, come ooooooon…” you said before passing out.

Back at the house you woke up woozy as hell. “Wow, I cant believe I shot Darling-kun. They may have been tranquilizer darts, but I’m surprised you’re okay after getting hit by three.” “Who taught you how to shoot?” “I could get in trouble for this. Don’t tell anyone okay?” she said with a wink. You were astounded by the woman. But then you quickly sat up. “Where are the girls? Normally they’d come running.” She pointed them out as they were staring in. They apologized and said they would restrain themselves. “What are you talking about? Sometimes you do go too far, and it’s not good to fight.” You stoop up but nearly fell. “Darling!” “But it’s really Smith who’s to blame here.” She spat out her coffee in surprise. “Problems happen. Isn’t learning to overcome them part of doing a homestay? And since this is a homestay, that makes us a family. So you don’t need to hold yourselves back.” “That’s perfect then!” You were confused but then Smith brought up that they were moving to change a few things in the Interspecies Exchange Bill, namely that marriage between humans and non-human species will be possible, as such, you were chosen as the experiment to this whole thing. Which Smith dropped on you before she left with Centorea’s homestay paperwork. “SAY WHAT?!?!?!?!?!?!”
