You're my friend Manako. I just want to know." Manako stuttered for a bit before she composed herself. "Well, when I was little, my big sister bullied me." Manako said sadly.

"You were bullied?" you asked, unsure of this story now. Manako only nodded. "I was such a crybaby, even among the Monoeyes. She was just trying to toughen me up, but my dad wanted to nurture me and make me feel better after that. So, he'd buy me an ice cream sandwich and stroked my hair while I ate. 1551211211112221.content:
(You, Manako-chan, Smith-san)

You went down stairs to cook your's and Manako's breakfast. Tough not before taking a bath and brushing your teeth. Once in the kitchen, you went to the fridge and took out a few eggs, butter, milk and other ingredients. Tonight was your graduation and you wanted to start of this day in a great way. You turned the stove on and began to prepare the pancakes when, out of the blue, you heard a well know female voice behind you.

"Ara, ara! Something smells good, Aito-kun!"

You turned around and as you expected, Ms. Smith was there.

"Ohayo, Smith-san."

"I'm not. I already got used to you showing up to breakfast. Why do you think I put three plates out instead of two?", you said, pointing to the three plates on the counter. "Besides, I was sure you were going to show up. Since last night was a Full Moon".

"Y-yes. She is. But, even if the IEB allowed such things, I wouldn't do any of it unless Manako-chan was willing".

"A-Aito-kun..."

"I heard it all.", said Manako with tears coming from her eye and a warm and bright smile on her face.

She then run towards you until she was a few feet away and threw herself at you, pushing Ms. Smith to the side (more like shoving her). As soon as you grabbed her, she wrapped her arms around your neck and gave you a tender hug, while she pressed her face on your chest.

You smiled warmly and hugged her back tightly, while using your right hand to caress her soft, dark purple hair. Ms. Smith was smiling all the time. She cared for all of the member of her squad deeply. They were like her own family to her. And she wouldn't forgive anyone who dared harm any of them. She was happy that Manako-chan was happy.

"The pancakes!"

You quickly put Manako-chan, who was a bit reluctant to let go of you, down and got the pancake off the fire just in time. Ms. Smith and Manako-chan sat on the table, waiting for you to finish cooking. Once you did, you put a stack of five chocolate-chips pancakes on each plate and took them to the table, along with a 2Lt bottle of Maple Syrup for anyone who wanted to add it to their pancakes.

By the end of breakfast, half of the bottle's content was gone and no pancake was left.

15512112111122211112.content:
(You, Manako-Chan)

The two of you needed to take a break after that intense showdown, so you both decided that it would be better if you just stayed home until your graduation. Still, that didn't mean that there weren't any issues you needed to air out. When you got about halfway there, Manako stopped.

"Aito-kun...we need to talk." Manako said nervously.

"What's wrong, Manako-chan?" you asked in concern.

"It's just...I'm really happy that you saved me and everything, but..."

"But what?" you asked, politely interrupting.

"I need to know something. Do you...have feelings for me?" Manako asked as her face turned red.

You sputtered comically and almost fell on your rear, but you could see that tears were welling up in Manako's eye. That instantly made you compose yourself and you gave her an honest answer.

"You know that I think you're cute and that I really like you. It's just...I can't go that far with you." you answered honestly.

"I know. It's against the rules of the IMB. If it wasn't...would you? I wouldn't want anyone else to be my first." Manako said, still blushing.

"Your first? I thought that Monoeyes had two genders like humans." you said in disbelief.

"Yes, but I never spent the night with a male Monoeye!" Manako said frantically. "Besides, I was such a big crybaby. I didn't think anyone would ever think of me like...that. That is, until you came into my life." Manako's blush intensified.

"Well, to answer your first question, you know I would. And if we're being completely honest, I wouldn't want anyone else as my first either." you said, blushing.

"So what do we do?" Manako asked.
15512112111122211112.title: Manako-chan stops for some reason.

"You...you mean it, Aito-kun?!" Manako said excitedly, blushing heavily.

"I know we can't get...physical. Still, there's nothing in the IMB that forbids us to date each other." you said, blushing a little.

Manako stared at you lovingly as steam poured out of her ears and she hurriedly nodded her head. "I...I'd love to." Manako said, about to faint from excitement.

Suddenly, you kissed her on her forehead, just right below her eye. Manko's eye became swirly as you led her back home. "Don't worry. Things are going to be okay for us." you reassured.

After you got your diploma, you drove yourself and Manako back home to change. Manako had worn the dress from the other day when you got ice cream and you were dressed in a regular black suit that itched madly. You never knew why, but suits always made your body itch. Anyway, you both decided it would be best to change clothes, so you went to your respective rooms to do so. When you got out, you wore a blue dress shirt with black shoes and matching pants, but you noticed that Manako was still not ready. You approached her door and knocked softly; Manako was easily startled by loud knocks.

"Manako-chan, are you ready?" you asked.

"In a minute, Aito-kun!" Manko replied frantically.

You waited on the couch for a few minutes before you heard the sound of high heels clacking. At first, you thought it was Ms. Smith, but you turned around and got the surprise of your life. Manako wore a bright red dress that tastefully showed off her petite frame with matching heels and a purse. She wore a red sunhat, only it didn't obscure her eye and you noticed that she wore a little red lipstick that made her beautiful lips look even more tempting. Fortunately, she avoided eye-shadow and blush, so she looked like a refined woman with just a hint of sexiness that made you have a nosebleed when you saw her.

"What do you think, Aito-kun?" Manako asked teasingly.

There were no words. All you could do is give a long, approving whistle that made Manako's face as red as her outfit. "AIto-kun, stop it!" Manako said halfheartedly, mostly because she was enjoying this. "You could turn a girl's head with a whistle like that!"

"Sorry, Manako-chan. It's just...now I feel under-dressed." you admitted, blushing heavily

"Don't be ridiculous. You look...handsome." Manako admitted.

With that, you two left and drove off into the night, but not alone. Inside a black van was Ms. Smith and Manako's old squad from M.O.N. Ms. Smith's glasses shone brightly as she drove the van and followed them.

"Remind me why we're following them?" Doppelganger asked.

"Yeah, It's Mana-chan!" Zombina dismissed. "She can take care of herself!"

"That doesn't matter. As members of M.O.N., we have to make sure that all monsters in the exchange program are safe with their human hosts. It's strictly business!" Ms. Smith said unconvincingly.

"Uh-huh. Business, huh?" Zombina said sardonically.

"Um...Smith-san, we have an emergency." Tionisha said shyly.

"Huh? What's wrong, Tio-chan?" Ms. Smith asked.

Ms. Smith and the rest of M.O.N. got their answer when they noticed Tionisha squirming and jamming her hand in her crotch armor. "I drank too much coffee! We need to stop!" Tionisha begged, on the verge of tears.

155311.content:
Lamias and Echidnas, hmm? Well, if you want to go with some snake-women, fine with me. Now then, since you might have no idea as to what a Lamia or Echidna is exactly, then allow me to elaborate on the subject:

LAMIA
A Lamia is a Demi-human with the lower body of a snake. Like snakes, lamia regularly shed their skin, and are cold-blooded as well. Their personalities are persistent, conjuring the images of snakes. They are carnivores, known to have a special preference for eggs. However, the tip of a Lamia's tail is an erogenous zone. Because their species consists only of females, Lamias require human males to reproduce.

ECHIDNA
Because more of their bodies are covered with scales compared to the Lamias, Echidnas are surprisingly closer to lizardfolk, despite their serpentine attributes. In translation, their name means "Viper Women", and true to their name, they possess a pair of poisonous fangs inside their mouths. According to biological studies, an Echidna's venom is a type of hemorrhagin, which must be treated with caution if one wants to avoid being accidentally bitten. And like the notorious family of venomous snakes, an Echidna's lower body is covered in a unique pattern reminiscent to the infamous viper.
155311.title: Lamia / Echidna

155312.content:
Into something more exotic like the Melusine and Medusa, hmm? Well, there's nothing wrong with trying something different. Anyway, getting back down to business. Since there might be a few of you who have never heard of these two subspecies, then allow me to explain:

MELUSINE
A lamia subspecies with dragon wings on it's back, Melusines actually share some characteristics with Dragonnewts. However, they are more similar to sea snakes than terrestrial snakes, preferring to live by the shore. Unfortunately, a Melusine's wings aren't powerful enough to their serpentine lower bodies, making them useless. There is little information about this Lamia subspecies aside from what's already been mentioned.

MEDUSA
Also known as Gorgons, Medusas are a subspecies of Lamia with snakes for hair, adopting the name of the most famous of the 3 Gorgon Sisters in Greek Mythology and Legend. According to the myths & legends, a Medusa's gaze can turn any living creature into stone. That is, if said creature wasn't made of stone already. But in actuality, they possess no such ability. However, their gaze is very keen, and a Medusa's glare makes living creatures unable to move, immobilized, almost as if they have been truly turned to stone like in the legends from Ancient Greece. In reality though.....it's another story entirely. Turns out they have poor eyesight and only appear to be giving one the legendary gaze, despite a Medusa's lack of ill will. Because their is simply made of snakes, Medusas are troubled by the fact that they are unable to change their hairstyle.

Dairy Breed Centaurs are a centaur subspecies that produces an exceptional amount of milk. Among the already well-endowed female centaurs, Dairy Centaurs have particularly large breasts. Because of this, they often serve as wet nurses for other centaurs who have trouble producing milk (like Lightweights), and due to this, it is common for Dairy Centaurs to live among groups of other centaur subspecies. HEAVYWEIGHT CENTAUR
Known for their sheer strength, Heavyweight Centaurs are the most muscular members of their species, so powerful that they can move around unimpeded even while wearing a heavy set of armor. However, since they rarely have opportunities to wear armor in modern times, Heavyweight Centaurs apply their strength towards farming and agriculture. They are the largest and most muscular of centaurs, and their legs are far thicker than those of other members of their kind. However, most Heavyweight Centaurs are gentle, good-natured, and absent-minded, and they are often dim-witted.

LIGHTWEIGHT CENTAUR
Also known as racing centaurs, Lightweight Centaurs are a subspecies that excels at running, due to being smaller than the standard centaur, with slimmer and tighter bodies. Though they approach their ranks and records with a stoic attitude and love running, Lightweight Centaurs can be easily injured, and they devote much of their attention to studying health care. They can be rather moody, but this can be attributed to timidity or physical and mental innocence, since their bodies aren't as large as the other Centaurs, neither are their breasts.

15533221.title: #5 - Mermaid

155332211.content:
Ah, Mermaids. The amphibious beauties of the Seven Seas. Whether they are depicted as the hypnotic Sirens who lure sailors to their deaths with their enchanted singing, or as beautiful princesses of the ocean like in Disney's The Little Mermaid, these aquatic beauties have been around for more than centuries. However, these aren't the Mermaids you've read about in Greek Mythology or watched on the big screen. And here's why:

MERMAID
Like one would expect when they hear the word Mermaid, these aquatic entities are a non-human species with the upper body of a human, and the lower body of a fish. Because they are known to live in the water, Mermaids have difficulty moving on land. However, as long as a Mermaid's gills remain moist, they are able to breathe above water. Due to their physiological anatomy, most Mermaids use the aid of a wheelchair to get around on land. To prevent their bodies from drying out, they are covered in what appears to be a moist mucus, which keeps them wet and stable enough to be on land. Oddly enough, their entire species loves the tale of "The Little Mermaid", longing for a tragic love like the one depicted in the famous fairy tale. Standard mermaids live within the waters of warm tropical oceans, and their scales and fins are known to be very colorful, much like tropical fish.

EEL
Eels are mermaids with long bodies like the serpentine Lamia. Unlike most mermaids, Eel Mermaids have little to no difficulty living on land. However, because they produce even more mucus than the standard mermaid, Eel Mermaids have difficulty wearing most clothes. Surprisingly, their massage techniques utilizing their mucus is highly advanced. However, an Eel Mermaid's mucus also possesses cosmetic properties as well, making them popular amongst the other mermaids. In addition, Eel Mermaids have a tremendous amount of stamina, often staying up all night. As a result, this makes sleep-deprived most of the time.

FRESHWATER MERMAID
Unlike the standard mermaids who reside within warm ocean waters, Freshwater Mermaids are known to regularly travel from rivers to oceans and back again. Known for their persistent nature, these stoic mermaids never give up their journey, regardless of any fierce rapids or waterfalls that may hinder their way. Because of this rigorous lifestyle, Freshwater Mermaids are known to have slim and fit bodies. However, due to the cold waters they swim in, a Freshwater Mermaid's colors are more muted than those of the standard mermaid.

You had already learned Japanese thanks to your foreign language class and you were excited to journey to a new home, especially after monsters were revealed to the world.

You'd long since been fascinated with the world of the supernatural, so of course you were happy when they became public. Fortunately, you'd been asked to be the host family for a Freshwater Mermaid named Sora, Sora looked like a beautiful girl with long strawberry-blond hair, red eyes, fair skin, and a rather impressive pair of boobs. However, she needed a wheelchair to get around because her lower half was a gray fish tail. She wore a blue strapless top with a matching sash around her waist. Her upper half appeared to be rather fit, but that wasn't a big deal to you.

Ms. Smith, the Interspcies Exchange Officer also provided a room for Sora, which was simply a large swimming pool with various mermaid exercise equipment to keep herself in shape. SHARK MERMAID
Named after the notorious predator of the ocean, this subspecies of mermaids are equipped with sharp teeth and the lower body of a shark. Unlike their fellow mermaids, Shark Mermaids are entirely carnivorous, which is a rare trait among the predominantly omnivorous mermaids. Like the hostile Bull & Tiger Sharks, the personalities of a Shark Mermaid could only be described as wild and aggressive. In other words, if you intend on being the host family to a Shark Mermaid, use extreme caution when caring for such a ferocious creature. In the past, they engaged in pirate-like activities. However, in more recent years, Shark Mermaids have begun to abstain from piracy. Like a real shark, the skeleton in their lower bodies are made of cartilage instead of bone, making them very delicate. Also, they happen to be mentally weak as well.

15533221222112.content:
Your name is Kasai Sendo. You are a twenty-year old African-American man who has lived in Japan your entire life. You were about 6 feet 10 inches tall with a shaved head and amber-red eyes. You usually wore a white shirt, blue jeans, and black boots. You had the Kajin for fire tattooed in black on your right hand, which was coincidentally your name in Japanese. It seemed fitting, considering what you were.

You never knew your parents and you didn't have any relatives that lived in Japan as far as you knew. You grew up in a broken-down orphanage under the care of Ms. Bellamy, the closest thing you ever had to a mother. She was a kind and sweet woman, even though her own children died in a horrible car accident alongside her husband. Everyday you wondered if you and the other orphans were just a way to fill the hole in her heart. Still, she always pushed you to aspire to greatness. She could never explain it, but she knew that there was something...extraordinary about you.

When you were about 5 years old, a family came in to adopt you. Before they could, however, something happened...something bad. You felt mysterious headaches, but the doctors could never find out what was wrong with you. However, the worst one happened when they arrived to sign the final papers to adopt you. It was then that your eyes glowed pure white and you shot fire from your hands. Unfortunately, it hit the wife's face and they immediately rescinded the adoption process. To this day, you couldn't stop blaming yourself for what happened.

After that, the other orphans hated you because families were too scared to even come near this place. They constantly bullied you and goaded you into setting yourself on fire, which you never did. After what happened, you were too afraid to sue your powers ever again. It wasn't until a week later that Ms. Bellamy let you in on a secret; you were a mutant. She kept the secret from you because she wasn't sure how powerful you were. The only reason she knew was because she was a mutant as well, but she could control the plants. Based on what she told you, mutants were rare and very powerful humans with various powers.

For their own protection, mutants' existence was kept in secret. Fortunately, that wasn't a problem for you since no one would believe a five-year old boy could control fire. After that, the orphans managed to get adopted, all except you since they were too afraid of you to try before. When you turned 18, you said goodbye to Ms. Bellamy and went on your own way to find some peace in this world. Fortunately, monsters had been revealed to the world a year ago, so mutants were shelved for now. This gave you two years to make something of your life. You manged to make a lot of money as a street performer using your fire, which Ms. Bellamy taught you to control. The first thing you bought, however, was the tattoo, so you'd never forget what you could do.

You managed to make enough money to get a down payment on a house and you currently lived alone. Today, you had to buy some groceries, mostly meat; you loved meat. As you walked back home...
15533221222112.title: OC Fire Manipulation # 2

choices: Ms. Smith arrives to tell you
155332212221121.content:
As you made your way back home, you saw what appeared to be a girl in a wheelchair with a backpack on the handles barrel past you, screaming her head off. You knew you had to act fast so you felt your feet tingle before they shot out flames that slowly lifted you up, but not before you set your groceries down. As soon as you were high enough in the air, you laid flat on your stomach and rocketed at supersonic speeds in a blaze of orange fire. You caught up with the girl just before she crashed into the ocean and lifted her up as he wheelchair fell in the water. You then set her down and gasped in shock by what you were seeing.

The girl appeared to be a young Caucasian woman, most likely your age, with boyish blue hair, amethyst eyes, and a small scar on her right cheek. She wore a black bandanna around her head, a white shirt with vertical blue stripes that exposed her belly button and barely contained her impressive cleavage, and a red skirt with a fake dagger holster on her right hip....only it wasn't a hip. Rather than legs, this girl had the lower body of a gray shark! You then remembered that there were sub-species of monsters and that this one must've been one from the mermaids.

She noticed you, but rather than thank you, her teeth turned to fangs and she let out a venomous scowl. "Idiot! What have you done?!" You then stared at her angrily. "Uh, news flash, shark bait, I was trying to save your life!"

"Well, la-de-da!" the shark-girl said rudely. "Thank's to your little "rescue", I can't move around any more to find my host family!"

You then flew up using your fire and effortlessly retrieved her wheelchair, much to her surprise. "There. Happy now?" you asked as the shark-girl merely huffed. "Hmph. Took you long enough, mutant."

"What's that supposed to mean?" you asked, feeling offended.

"You know what it means. Your kind is just as hated as ours, but at least our kind's sexy!" the shark-girl flaunted.

"Oh, yeah." you said sarcastically. "I'll bet every man wants to do it with a shark-girl."

"You're damn right!" the shark-girl replied, apparently either unaware of ignoring your sarcasm. She then took out her papers that were in her water-proof backpack. "Hey, do you know where Kasai Sendo lives? He's my host family."

You stared at her incredulously and only let out two words. "Oh, crap."

What now?
155332212221121.title: You see a girl in a wheelchair barreling down

1553322122211211.content:
Before you could speak, a black car pulled up and out came a young woman with long black hair and sunglasses that hid her brown eyes. She wore a white dress shirt with a black tie, a black blazer and matching professional skirt, black pantyhose and heels. This was Kuroko Smith, better known as Ms. Smith, a Cultural Exchange Security Squad Coordinator. She smiled brightly when she saw you.

"Hello, Kasai Sendo. We've been waiting to officially meet you." Ms. Smith said as she approached the duo.

"Wait, this mutie is my host family?!" the shark-girl yelled incredulously as she propped herself back on her wheelchair.

"Yes, Mizu." Ms. Smith said, only to give her a venomous glare. "That's an offensive term for someone who saved your wheelchair and your life."

"Oh, please!" Mizu brushed off. "I was going to land in water!"

"Actually, at the speed you were going, you would've broken your neck upon impact." Ms. Smith revealed. "If Kasai hadn't intervened, you would've died."

Mizu was speechless. If that was true, she really owed him an apology, but that would have to come later when you interrupted her train of thought. "Wait, how do you even know that I'm a mutant?" Kasai asked.

"My department keeps track of monsters and those with powers. We've had our eye on you for some time, Kasai. It's exactly why we chose you as Mizu's host family." Ms. Smith revealed.

You looked at your hands before you shot her a glare. "If you know what I am, then you know I'm dangerous. I can barely control my powers when I street perform."

"That may be true, but Mizu is too dangerous for an ordinary human to take care of her. She needs someone who can keep her in check." Ms. Smith reasoned. She then shot a teasing smile. "Besides, all the paperwork is filled out and the renovations are finished. You're stuck with her." Before you could attack her, Ms. Smith departed in the car, which made you and Mizu sigh in disappointment.

"I guess we're stuck with each other." you conceded.

"There are worse humans. I guess you're not bad." Mizu said, suppressing a small blush.

With that, the two of you headed back home. Later...
1553322122211211.title: Ms. Smith arrives to tell you

15533221222112112.content:
(You, Mizu)

After the two of you made it back to your home, Mizu was actually impressed. The amount of money you earned as a street performer allowed you to buy a two-story house in Akihabara, which you moved to due to your love of otaku shops. Ever since you learned that you were a mutant, you were fascinated by the world of otaku, specifically anything that could be a new technique for you to master. Fortunately, Ms. Smith's organization put in a wheelchair ramp for Mizu, much to your surprise. You then wheeled her inside, unaware that she was feeling guilty about what she said earlier.

"Oh, what should I do? He saved my life and I was a total bitch to him. He could have roasted me alive and make shark-sticks, but he didn't. Oh, what should I do?!"Mizu silently lamented.

Unbeknownst to Mizu, you were also thinking of how to apologize. "Uh, what do I do? Mizu might be as mean as a shark, but she didn't deserve me calling her "shark bait". I should know better. If everyone knew what I was, they'd call me things too. I've gotta figure out how I can tell her.

Suddenly, when you wheeled her inside and shit the door, Mizu said, "I'm sorry."

You stood there for a few moments before you responded. "What did you just say?" you asked, flabbergasted.

"Look, this is really hard for me to admit, so I won't say it again. Just, take it or leave it okay?!" Mizu bellowed, suppressing a heavy blush. Unexpectedly, you then replied, "I'm sorry too.I should've known better."

After that, the two of you stayed in blissful silence before you wheeled her to her room, which looked more like a dungeon to you. While it appeared to be a large swimming pool, the interior heavily resembled a cave and the pool had spikes jutting out of it's perimeter except for the stairs. While you thought this looked weird, Mizu unexpectedly smiled and revealed her dark-gray shark ears.

"It's just like home!" Mizu yelled jubilantly as she jumped into the pool and started to swim with great fervor. While you couldn't understand this, seeing Mizu smile from this made you smile a little. She then shot a teasing smile.

"What's wrong, matchstick?! Afraid you'll douse your flame if you come inside?!" Mizu playfully taunted.

"Nah, but things are about to get hot!" you said as you lit your hands on fire and touched the pool water. Instantly, the water boiled and out came a very heated Mizu who flopped around comically, but still smiled. "You'll have to do better that that, Inferno!"

"Inferno?" you said in brief reverence. "I like that."

Later...
15533221222112112.title: Forgive and Forget

155332212221121121.content:
After that session. it was close to dinner time, so you put on an apron and started cooking. Since you lived alone, you had to know how to take care of yourself. You knew everything on house maintenance and cooking; especially cooking. You weren't sure if it was because of your mutant ability to make fire, but there was something about cooking that you couldn't help but love. As such, you started to cook the meat, which Mizu smelled and instantly wheeled herself into the kitchen, drooling hungrily.

"Is that meat?!" Mizu said hungrily.

"Yeah. I love cooking it. I'm guessing that you also love it?" you implied. Mizu promptly nodded in excitement. "I'm a member of the Shark Race. We only eat meat!" Mizu then attempted to grab the cooking meat, only for you to grab her hand.

"Be patient. You'll eat when it's ready." you chastised like a parent would to a child. Mizu then stared at you incredulously. "Don't treat me like a child! Why are you even cooking it?! It tastes delicious raw!"

"Trust me, you'll like it when it's cooked." you said, cracking a small smile before you released her hand. Mizu only childishly huffed. "I doubt that, mutated human."

After a few minutes, which to Mizu felt like hours, you finally arrived with two plates of steak and salad, although Mizu was focused more on the meat, even if it was cooked. She took a deep whiff and smiled a little. "It smells...better." Mizu admitted reluctantly.

"Don't be shy, dig in." you encouraged, only for Mizu to grab the steak and swallow it whole, much to your surprise. After a few moments, Mizu's eyes lit up and she gave a very girly scream. "This is the best meat I've ever had!" Mizu yelled jubilantly.

"I do my best. Although, you should try chewing it next time." you said as you enjoyed your own meal.

Later...
155332212221121121.title: You prepare dinner

1553322122211211212.content:
It was the middle of the night when you felt..."that" again. It felt like your entire skeleton was on fire as you tossed and turned in your fire-retardant sheets. You sweated madly as fire shot out of your hands intermittently. You felt your insides clench as you started to scream loudly in pain. It wasn't long before Mizu came in and jumped out of her wheelchair to see you. She saw how much pain you were in, so she did her best to calm you down.

"Kasai, Kasai, calm down!" Mizu begged, unaware that she had tears in her eyes. "You've got to snap out of it!"

Mizu then slapped you across your face, which made her gasp in shock. You then instantly woke up, breathing heavily. You turned around and saw Mizu with a look of remorse and fear, but your warm smile put her fears to rest. "It's okay. I'm fine now."

Mizu sighed in relief, but she had to know about this. "Why were your powers acting up?"

You let out a long sigh and said...

1553322211.content:
Oh, so you prefer a woman with some extra legs like the arachne, hmm? Well, to each his own, I guess. However, if you are either confused and curious about these unique creatures, then here is some information about them for reassurance:

ARACHNE
Like the Centaurs, the Arachne are a non-human species. But instead of the lower body of a horse, the Arachne have the lower body of a spider. According to their physiology, Arachne have between four and six eyes, and are completely carnivorous. Like the average spider, the Arachne can secrete thread from the tip of their abdomen, which they use to spin webs and traps. These hunters normally capture their prey in traps, but as hunting is unnecessary in human society, the Arachne pass the time by making knitted goods and dolls with their thread. Their hunter instincts compel them to tie people up and play with them, almost like they were marionettes. And like a human would get drunk from alcoholic beverages, the Arachne can get drunk from consuming drinks with caffeine in said beverages, such as coffee.

LARGE ARACHNE
Out of all the Arachne, the Large Arachne is a subspecies that is drastically larger the standard arachne, with thick legs and a covering of hair. In addition to being the strongest of their species, Large Arachne are known to be very wild and aggressive, biologically equipped with venom, making them extremely dangerous to approach without caution. Fortunately, the Large Arachne's venom isn't particularly strong or harmful. Due to their near-feral nature, Large Arachne are not well-suited to interspecies exchange programs. According to police reports, when Large Arachne have interacted with humans, they're most likely expected to be arrested for assault and causing other problems. However, if you intend on being the host family to a Large Arachne, expect your time with her to be a rather....difficult experience. In other words, keep her at your own risk.

Well there you have it, ladies and gentlemen. The Arachne! Now then, which member of this species of monsters do you want? The standard Arachne, or the deadly hostile Large Arachne? Time to pick your poison!

155332221112.content:
Oh, so you want to have some superpowers added into the mix, hmm? Well, this should be interesting. And to start things off, we'll begin with one of the most variable of the long list of superhuman abilities; Ice Manipulation

ICE MANIPULATION
Power/Ability to: Manipulate cold and ice.

Also known as Cryokinesis, Ice Manipulation is the ability to manipulate cold and ice. This chilling power is a sub-power of Thermal Manipulation, a variation of Water Manipulation, and the opposite ability to Magma Manipulation.

CAPABILITIES
Like a ferocious blizzard, the user can create, shape, and manipulate ice, water frozen into a solid state and appears naturally in the form of snow, hail, icicles, ice spikes and candles, glaciers, pack ice, frost, and polar ice caps, and cold by reducing the kinetic energy of atoms, thus making things colder, for various effects and combinations.

APPLICATIONS
*Ice Attacks

Divided into two groups depending on whether they use Cold or Ice:

*Create/generate/increase, shape and manipulate cold for various effects, freezing areas of differing sizes/shapes and/or objects for several effects:
-Cold Energy Manipulation
-Frostbite to freeze anything to atomic levels, making it fragile.

*Create/generate/increase ice.
-Ice Negation
-Shape, compress, and/or otherwise manipulate ice.
*Ice Shard Manipulation
-Move/lift ice at nearly any speed whether in/on a surface, air, or water. One could even do this in the vacuum of space if one has a way to survive the experience.
-Create Cryokinetic Constructs including weapons, walls, etc.

TECHNIQUES
*Cryokinetic Combat
*Cryokinetic Regeneration

1553322211121.content:
Okay, so you plan on going with having the power of Ice Manipulation AKA Cryokinesis. Now then, since this is an interactive story and choice happens to be an important matter to discuss, I will leave 3 options for the desired character to use. The first option being reserved for me, Vocal, while the bottom two are free to use, fellow readers.

Anyway, let's begin this story, shall we?
1553322211121.title: Ice Manipulation

choices: You run into an Arachne getting beaten up by a mob of racists.
You were greeted by a woman in a black business suit.
You began to receive a call from your cell phone.
15533222111211.content:
"We cling to our own point of view, as though everything depended on it. Yet our opinions have no permanence; like autumn and winter, they gradually pass away."
-Zhuangzi

Your name is Elijah Prentiss. You are a 19 year old Caucasian male from the United States, more specifically from the urban oasis known commonly as Las Vegas, Nevada. In appearance, you stand around 5 feet 10 inches in height, have short snow white hair, and two different eye colors. Your right eye was a jade green color, while your left was colored a pale icy blue hue. Your usual attire consisted of a dark red T-shirt with a large kanji symbol on the front, dark jeans, black and neon green basketball sneakers, and a dark grey trench coat with light grey faux fur stitched inside, as you walked down the streets of Tokyo in the midst of a cloudy autumn day, the extended ends of your trench coat flapping in the breezy wind.

While you passed by pedestrian traffic, as the locals attempted to warm themselves up for the inevitable winter that was approach months from now, you were unfazed by the cold air. And there's a good reason why. Your father happened to be the leading scientist in a secret project funded by a corporation known as Medici Cryogenics, who use the scientific expertise on cryogenics, which involves dealing with using very low temperatures, not just a concept with the realm of science fiction.

However, something....happened at the age of 6 years old, when you were brought in to see your father's work, as part of the occasional "Take Your Kid To Work Day". Acting like a kid your age would do, your childish curiosity got the better of you, as you were caught right in the middle of one of your father's experiments, forcing him to turn off the experiment when he saw you screaming from the painful shocks and the frosty wind whirling around you.

Miraculously, you survived....but, you were changed as a result. The experiment turned your dark blonde hair white as snow, your left eye changed into a pale icy blue color, and your hands felt as cold as ice. And yet, the most drastic change of all: you now had the power over ice and anything that was just as cold. At first, your family was caught by surprise when you suddenly sprung to life and a set of ice shards suddenly shot out from the palms of your hands. And yet, your condition was made clear when you fainted from Nevada's notorious triple-digit heat, just seconds after you've been cleared to leave the hospital. Since one of your uncles owns a refrigeration truck, your father called him to get the truck over to the hospital ASAP, despite telling him "I'll explain it later".

But over time, your mother, your sister, older brother, and younger brother coped somewhat with the realization that you now have ice powers, with differing opinions of course. Your younger brother, Jason, thought that you were awesome, since he was into superheroes, and seeing you have superpowers made him think you're the best brother in the world. After all, he was only a baby when you got your powers, so he was the most well-adjusted of your family towards your chilling abilities.

Though as for how you managed to arrive here in Japan, turns out there was more than just one singular reason. Apparently, shortly after the existence of monsters was made public to the world and the Interspecies Exchange Bill was passed, the Japanese government had taken interest in your abilities, obviously for law enforcement. By then, you were already 16 years of age. In exchange for your services, the government would give you and your family a place to stay, which came in the form of a penthouse within Downtown Shinjuku (one of Tokyo's districts), giving you a good view of Tokyo Bay.

Plus, due to your newfound abilities to control ice, your body had difficulty managing the dry temperatures of the Mojave Desert, so your parents figured it would be a good time to move, despite your sister being upset about the ordeal. Then again, you don't blame her for what happened.

==========

Getting back to the present, you were currently walking through a busy street market, just simply taking in the sights. However, you noticed what appeared to be a female centaur with long blonde hair wearing an insulated jacket and long black skirt for the current weather, as she was accompanied by a young many with black hair wearing jeans, tennis shoes, gloves, and a brown coat with a fur collar, along with a navy blue beanie hat on his head.

Although you figured that they were here for groceries, you couldn't help but feel a little envious. After all, you had trouble getting a girl due to your chilling abilities. Either the girl you wanted to date would just laugh at you for making up what she thought was an excuse, or she would faint from seeing you using your powers as proof, which dampened your mood from the aftermath.

However, just as you were about to leave the street market......
15533222111211.title: Ice Manipulation OC Option #1(Reserved)

choices: Being the compassionate guy, you brought Alma home to fix her up.
Unfortunately, Alma started shivering due to the cold weather.
155332221112111.content:
Just when you were about to call your older brother to let him know where you are, something quickly caught your attention, which came in the form of a woman screaming, "Hey, stop that! Leave me alone, you creeps!" "Sorry freak, but you're not allowed here!" A voice replied, as you distinctly recognized it as male. At first, you thought it was some group of assholes giving a girl a hard time, but it wasn't until you moved through the crowd a little and saw what was actually occurring; a gang of racists picking on a female Arachne. Sure you were familiar with what an Arachne actually is, but from what you were witnessing, these guys definitely wanted to beat her up, as they were backing her into a corner, carrying what appeared to be rusty pipes and baseball bats.

Obviously pissed off at what these full-grown men were about to commit, you pulled up the neckwarmer scarf around your neck, covering up the lower half of your face, all while having this angry look on your face, nostrils flaring. Fortunately, there were a decent amount of puddles surrounding the nearby area, giving you some water to freeze with your ice powers. But as your walking pace became more aggressive, you quickly grabbed a baseball bat from a nearby vendor, dunked the upper quarter of the bat into a large bucket of water, then quickly used your ice powers to harden the water into solid ice.

But as you aggressively approached the nearest thug, you got his attention by yelling, "Hey asshole!"

Before he could even react, WHAM!! You violently swung the ice-coated bat right at the man's face, knocking him off his feet and becoming unconscious from hitting the back of his head against the pavement. Both the Arachne and the remaining gang of racists were caught by surprise from what just happened. However, the racists quickly recovered, shifting their focus from the female Arachne and onto you.

Quickly, you dodged one man's attack, and lunged toward a nearby puddle, dunking your fist into the water, as you froze the water around your hand, then instinctively delivered a brutal backhand into the man's head, and quickly swung the baseball bat into his friend, KO-ing both men in unison. But while you continued to fight against her attackers, the female Arachne looked at you with a mix of awe and fear.

But as another guy was charging toward, you quickly froze the puddle he was standing in, covering his feet and ankles in ice, where you then struck at his head from behind with a powerful dropkick, both feet making direct contact with the man's head, as he lost consciousness from the attack.

However, just as the last remaining guy attempted to get away, you quickly froze the water he was still kneeling in, restraining him from doing anything harmful aside from making threats. Approaching the downed racist, you noticed some papers in the back of his cargo pants. Out of curiosity, you took the papers out of his back pocket, unfolding them to see what he had. What you found apparently, were the documents for the female Arachne to be assigned to a host family. And it had the signatures of your parents: Maxwell & Josephine Prentiss.

"These are her documents. You and your buddies stole them to beat her up, didn't you?!" You growled, your tone seething with venom toward the man, connecting the dots together from what sort of crime they were about to commit, aside from assault and battery. In response, the man spoke toward you , stuttering from his decreased body temperature, and growled, "S-So w-w-what?! That 8 l-legged f-f-freak d-doesn't b-b-belong h-here! S-She- GAAAH!!!"

Sick of the man's hurtful rantings toward the female Arachne standing nearby, you grabbed a nearby bucket full of water and chucked the cold water in his direction, interrupting him, as he felt his body temperature drop just a little more. From there, you put a foot on his back and pressed down on the man's back, looking down at him and yelled, "Insult her one more time, and I'll show you what hypothermia feels like!!"

"I'm s-s-s-SORRY!!" He apologized, obviously coming to the realization of his....current situation. For you, it was better than nothing, as you use the handle of the bat, butting it against the man's head, knocking him out cold from the concussive blow. "Jackasses." You muttered, as you stood back up from the unconscious thug, turning around to face the female Arachne, just to see if she was injured.

In appearance, the female Arachne had fair skin, six violet eyes, and long pink hair that reached a foot below her waist and hips, right her upper human half connects with her spider half, where her hair was put into a slight bubble ponytail halfway down her long hair. Her spider half was a mahogany red color, which has this white jolly roger pattern on her rear abdomen, minus the skull. Like her lower half, the Arachne's clawed hands and forearms were a mahogany red hue, covered up by these green silk sleeves. Covering her ample chest, she wore what appeared to be a green silk nightshirt, something not suitable to wear during the autumn or winter seasons.

However, you noticed that her arms were wrapped around what looks like a suitcase, gripping tightly to it like a kid would hug a stuffed animal out of comfort. From seeing the fear in her eyes a little, you tossed the bat off to the side, showing her that you're not a threat to her, slowly approaching her while she backed away from you until she felt her rear abdomen bumped into the wall behind her, leaving her with nowhere else to go as you spoke toward her and said, "Hey, take it easy there. I'm not gonna hurt you."

Still silent as she was earlier, the Arachne didn't speak to you. And yet, you continued to ease the tension between you and her,as you slowly extended your hand toward her, just as she flinched some from the friendly gesture, and you said, "......Name's Eli. Any chance you can tell me yours?" Shortly after your attempt to introduce yourself, there was this awkward moment of silence between you and the female Arachne. However, just when you figured you might as well give up on her, you suddenly heard what sounded like a young woman's voice.

The voice sounded timid and frail, but youthful, as you heard the Arachne's voice for the first time when she answered, ".....Alma. M-My name is...Alma."
155332221112111.title: You run into an Arachne getting beaten up

choices: You called for someone to pick up you & Alma.
But then, you're greeted by a woman in a black business suit.
1553322211121112.content:
Coming to the realization that you weren't going to actually harm her like those thugs were, the timid female Arachne, who introduced herself as Alma, slowly extended her mahogany red clawed right hand, showing how edgy and timid she was from the ordeal. However, you carefully held her hand in response, slowly shaking it out of compassionate reassurance, just as you lowered you neckwarmer scarf to reveal your face to her and answered, "Alma, huh? That's a cute name."

"You....y-you really th-think so?" Alma asked, shocked at first, but it resolved to a beet red blush on her cheeks, obviously showing the tell-tale signs that she was feeling bashful about having a boy holding her hand, her eyes attempting to look away from you a little, just as you then let go of her hand. However, you then began to notice her body was shaking, as Alma wrapped her arms tighter around herself, her sharp clawed digits squeezed tighter. And yet, you could swear that you can hear the sound of chattering teeth emanating from Alma's closed mouth, all while still gripping tightly onto the purple suitcase in her possession, along with looking a little exhausted, her six eyes struggling to stay awake.

Becoming concerned for her well-being, you snapped the fingers on your left hand some, placing said next to Alma, gaining her attention, and said, "Hey. Are you okay there, Alma? You....don't exactly look alright." "Uh...U-Uh huh *shivering mixed with quick labored breathing*." Was all that Alma could mutter, her body physically shivering coupled with quick-paced laboring breaths. Although you didn't exactly have much knowledge on whether Arachnes were warm-blooded or cold-blooded, you could see the universal signs of a person shivering from the cold.

Instinctively, you quickly took off your coat, as you hoisted it around Alma as you spoke toward the shivering Arachne and said, "Here, wear this." In response, Alma wrapped the coat around her a little tighter, absorbing the warmed-up trenchcoat while still holding onto the suitcase with one clawed hand. Shortly after receiving your coat to warm herself up, Alma then noticed that you didn't have anything to warm up with, looking at you with worry and asked, "B-But....what about y-you? W-Won't you get cold a-as well?"

Although you could understand Alma's concern, your powers over ice allowed your body to negate ice and ice-based attacks, ignoring the effects it has on the human body, as you flexed your digits, cracking your knuckles and neck as well. From there, you looked back at Alma, still wearing your dark red T-shirt, dark jeans, and black & neon green basketball sneakers, where you spoke to her and answered, "I'll be fine. Besides, I'm not exactly what you would call 'fully human' anymore."
1553322211121112.title: Being Chivalrous

choices: "Let's just say that there are certain laws that make us unable to act."
"Oh, it's simple really. Do you remember the Interspecies Exchange Bill?"
15533222111211121.content:
But then, Alma noticed you dialing the numbers on your Android SmartPhone, as if you were planning on calling someone. "Um, E-Eli.....w-what are y-y-you d-doing?" She asked, stuttering some from her teeth and fangs chattering due to the cold environment she was standing in, despite you giving her coat to her for warmth. "Calling us in a ride." You answered, reassuring her that you intend on getting her out of the chilling weather.

From there, you put the phone up to your right ear, hearing it ringing until you heard what sounded like a middle-aged British man's voice speak to you on the phone and asked, "Yes?" "Adrian, it's me." You answered back, identifying yourself to the man, as if he had some history with you. In response, you heard Adrian spoke back with relief in his English tone and said, "Master Elijah, thank the heavens no harm has come to you! Are you alright, sir?"

"It's okay, Adrian. I'm fine. However, I am going to need a ride back home. Think you can do that?" You replied, reassuring Adrian that you're unharmed, asking if he can escort you and Alma back to your family's penthouse manor here in Tokyo. But then, you heard Adrian say something as he asked, "Is this about your family adopting one of these...extra-species, Master Elijah?" "....Adrian, you're making me a little worried here. What are you talking about?" You responded, becoming just a little concerned and slightly confused as well, cocking an eyebrow while speaking toward him, just as Alma began to eavesdrop on the conversation a little.

"My apologies, Master Elijah. Your father was contacted by a woman from the Japanese government, a Ms. Smith. I believe she is a Cultural Exchange Coordinator, sir." Adrian explained, his British accent showed signs of reassurance in his explanation toward you. "*sigh* Of course it had to be someone from the Cultural Exchange Program. So, what exactly was the reason why she paid my father a visit? .....Adrian, you still there?" You said, checking if Adrian was still on the phone, only to receive the voice of a mature adult woman on the line instead, catching you off-guard when she answered, "So, you must be one of the sons of Dr. Maxwell Prentiss. Your parents must care about you to allow you to roam the streets of Tokyo all by your lonesome."

"Who are you? What have you done with Adrian?" You growled, showing a sliver of hostility toward the mystery woman substituting the man you call Adrian, obviously concerned for his well-being. In response, you heard the woman's voice once more on the phone, as she spoke toward you and replied, "Now now, Mr. Prentiss; I did not bring harm to your butler friend. In fact, he just left, possibly to drive one of those fancy limos your family owns to pick you up."

Despite you were in relief to hear that Adrian was okay, the woman continued to speak and said, "As for my identity however, my name is Kuroko Smith. But you can call me Ms. Smith. Now, my reasons for visiting your family's.....expensive residence, I am here on business. You see, the extra-species your family was to receive, has....wandered off on her own, possibly to find her assigned host family. Her name is Alma Spinnerette, and she is an Arachne."

While the woman, now identified as Ms. Smith, explained the situation to you, you looked back at Alma, who blushed some from you simply gazing at her, where your mind put two-and-two together, already realizing why Alma was out here by her lonesome. From there, you interrupted Ms. Smith and said, "Don't tell me: Does she have fair skin, six violet eyes, long pink hair, and has a lower spider half that's colored a mahogany red hue with a pattern that looks like a pair of crossed bones on her rear abdomen?"

Shortly after you spoke, there was this awkward moment of silence between you and Ms. Smith on the phone line, even though Alma was in a mix of confusion and slight concern when you gave an accurate description of her physical appearance toward the female government agent. However, you then heard Ms. Smith's voice once more, only it sounded like there was a subtle hint of shock under the female agent's calm alluring demeanor, where she spoke back and asked, "....Actually, yes.....that's basically an accurate description of Ms. Spinnerette! But.....You're right next to her, aren't you?"

"No Shit, Sherlock! I mean, what's wrong with you, lady?! If you even call yourself a Cultural Exchange Coordinator, next time: Don't leave your extra-species clients to be attacked unprovoked by a bunch of racist jackasses!" You exclaimed, obviously just a tad pissed off at how lazy this Ms. Smith was when doing her job, plus showing that you care about Alma's safety for the first time, aside from giving her your trenchcoat to warm up.

"Oh? And did you, say, beat up these 'racist jackasses' with , oh....I don't know, ice powers?" She smugly replied, retaliating for you berating her on how she should run her job. However, hearing what Ms. Smith had just said to you gave you cold feet (no pun intended), your eyes widen out of surprise. Your thoughts racing a little as you spoke in your subconscious and thought, "What the?! How the hell did she know about my powers? I always try to cover up my identity when I use them, Dammit! Unless...." Slowly, you looked around your surroundings, noticing several things that....stood out.

The first thing you noticed was an Ogre girl, who stood close to 3 meters in height, sporting long golden blonde, with a single horn sticking out from her forehead, towering over the crowd somewhat, sticking out like a sore thumb. Then, you noticed what appeared to be a Zombie girl, her hair a magenta pink and placed in a semi-spiky fashion, her right a golden yellow, while her left eye was a jade green, having what appeared to be stitches on her face, since Zombies were basically undead. And finally, you noticed what appeared to be a female Monoeye on one of the lower rooftops, holding what appeared to be a military-grade sniper rifle, aiming directly at you.

"Of course. They were blending in with the crowd." You thought, letting out a frustrated sigh, looking straight at the Monoeye sniper while you heard Ms. Smith's voice over the phone once more as she said, "Judging from your silence, I can tell you've noticed my agents then." "Obviously. So tell me: If you had agents keeping an eye on Alma, then why didn't they just help her when those assholes were haing her?" You asked, still angry at how something like this could happen to someone like Alma. In response, you heard Ms. Smith as she answered....
15533222111211121.title: Calling A Chauffeur

choices: "Well, let's just say you'll eventually find the answer, Mr. Prentiss."
Suddenly, you noticed Adrian approach with the limo.
155332221112111211.content:
"Let's just say that there are certain laws that make us unable to act, Mr. Prentiss. In other words, I cannot give my agents the order to attack these, as you would put it, 'racist jackasses' without violating the Interspecies Protection Act." Ms. Smith answered, bluntly explaining the sensitive diplomatic issue that came with the Interspecies Exchange Bill: Stigma.

After all, you were very much familiar with the Interspecies Exchange Bill and the laws that were combined with it, since you've extensively read about it online. However, one thing you didn't like about it was the immunity Humans would get from being harmed by one of the extra-species, which gave the racists free reign to harass innocent extra-species like Alma as long as they don't get caught, which was all the more reasons why it felt so satisfying to deliver an ice-coated baseball bat to the faces of these oversized bullies.

"So you're basically saying that these cocky pricks are untouchable and your non-human agents can't lift a single finger to stop them?" You said, obviously irritated from why Ms. Smith's agents couldn't do a damn thing to stop Alma from being harassed by the group of jerks before you arrived. From there, you spoke back toward Ms. Smith on your cell phone and growled, "You see, this is one of the reasons why I do the whole vigilante thing: Because you can't seem to do a damn thing when people like these dumbasses harass innocents like Alma."

Obviously aware of the venomous tone seeping through your mouth just now, Ms. Smith still remained as calm as ever, speaking to you from herend of the phone call and replied, "Although I understand your....assertive ranting, Mr. Prentiss, but this is one of the reasons why I've sent Ms. Spinnerette to live with you and your family. Plus, I was informed by my superiors about your....unique abilities, along with your *ahem* 'Vigilante career', as one would clearly determine, judging from your non-lethal handiwork."

Carefully listening to her words, your mind connected the dots as to what she meant, where you then spoke toward Ms. Smith and said, "So, you're just using me like some tool?"

"Now, I wouldn't call it by such a vulgar term. I prefer to see it as a 'service to the extra-species community', Mr. Prentiss." She remarked, revealing that silver tongue of hers over the phone from her dialogue with you, propping her left leg over her right leg while seated in her office chair, along with showing her intelligence. After all, being a Cultural Exchange Coordinator requires having some finesse when it comes to the matters of diplomacy.

However, you couldn't help but have this feeling of paranoia, as if Ms. Smith had some ulterior motive with sending Alma to live with you and your family, where you then spoke toward the Cultural Exchange Coordinator and asked, "Why do I get the feeling that you're hiding something from me?" Instead of hearing a response, there was this short moment of unexpected silence on Ms. Smith's end of the line, where she then spoke once more and answered......
155332221112111211.title: Certain Laws & Loopholes

choices: Along the way, you tried to have a conversation with Alma.
Skip toward when you arrive at your home.
Actually, something else happens along the way.
1553322211121112112.content:
"In due time, Mr. Prentiss. In due time." Ms. Smith responded, which ended with only a single click, indicating that she hung up on you, ending the conversation....at least, for now. However, it was there that you noticed a black limousine pull up and park itself by the sidewalk. Fortunately, you recognized it as your family's limo, just as you noticed the front car door opening, revealing it to be none other than than Adrian, your family's butler.

You smirked out of relief, thankful that Adrian was very much alright. From there, you gently held Alma by her clawed right hand, guiding her toward the limousine, all while doing your best to keep her calm. After all that has happened moments ago, you thought it would be best to take her someplace safe, like your family's manor-like penthouse. You didn't notice at first, but Alma's cheeks began to blush slightly, just from the fact on how nice you we're being to her.

Out of chivalry, you allowed Alma to enter the limousine first, due to her overall size, as she leaned forward and ducked down to fit inside the doorway, where you then entered into the limo next, while Adrian closed the door before stepping back inside the driver's seat and proceeded to drive the vehicle toward your family's estate.
1553322211121112112.title: A Limo Ride Home

choices: How you got your powers in the first place.....
What your family was actually like....
Actually, there was another topic she wanted to discuss instead.....
15533222111211121121.content:
However, as the limousine traveled alongside the local traffic, you noticed how quiet and antisocial Alma currently was, obviously still a little shaken by what happened to her previously. So, in an effort to ease her worries before the two of you arrived at your family's estate, you decided to stir up a bit of a conversation with the timid Arachne, hoping to lower her stress some, as you spoke to her and said, "So, um..Alma, what made you.....decide to have my family as your host family?"

Of course, Alma didn't respond to your question a little, so you gently tapped her on the shoulder to grasp her attention, causing the female Arachne to jump a little out of shock, which in turn, you attempted to reassure her and said, "Hey, Hey! It's okay. I just wanted to ask you a question and you weren't listening." Fortunately, Alma managed to calm down some, letting out some deep breaths in the process."Wow, she must be really timid if she reacted like that. Better be more careful on what I do, not that I want to give the poor girl a heart attack." You thought to yourselfwarning yourself to be more cautious in your behavior, since Alma seemed to still be recovering from what happened earlier with those racists that harassed her earlier.

"I'm.....l-l'm sorry, Eli. Did....d-did you say something?" She asked, slowly tightening her grip around her suitcase out of stress, obviously feeling like she was being interrogated. However, in response, you gently put a hand in her shoulder out of reassurance, trying to make her feel more relaxed, especially since you gave her your jacket to wear due to it currently being the middle of the autumn season. From there, you gently spoke toward Alma and replied, "...Look, I'm not trying to force anything out of you, Alma. I just want to what made you go with my family as your host family. Nothing more, nothing less.....alright?"

Originally, Alma appeared hesitant to answer your question upon first glance. But then, she let out a deep exhaled breath, probably as a way to steady her nerves, as the Arachne slowly turned to look at you and answered, ".....Ms. Smith recommended that I-I would be assigned to....to your family." "*sigh* Of course, that would explain a lot." You thought to yourself once more, now realizing why such a timid Arachne would be sent to you and your family. Of course, you couldn't blame Ms. Smith's decision to send Alma to you and your family.

After all, from what you've learned from the phone conversation with the Cultural Exchange Coordinator, Ms. Smith has kept an extensive eye on you for a good amount of time. In other words, it seemed fitting to send such a frail Arachne to an individual whose capable of protecting her easily. And what recently happened involving a gang of racist jackasses definitely proved your mettle.

So in response to Alma's answer, you looked back at the shy Arachne known as Alma Spinnerette and said, "....I see. Well, I guess that explains why she was at my house." "But....why would you say that?" Alma asked, confused over why you said something like that, only to realize something: Ms. Smith probably contacted you on your phone, where Alma then looked back at you and said, "She.....She called you, didn't she?"

But as the limousine turned right, leading into another street leading toward your family's home estate, you nodded once in confirmation toward Alma and explained, "Yeah....she did, Alma. She did. She called me on the same phone line I used to contact an old friend of my family, Adrian. He works for my parents as a loyal butler. It's how I was able to get us a limo instead of us just walking all the way home."

In all honesty, Alma was somewhat surprised at this revelation, since she knew little about you and your family aside from the recent fact that you had superpowers. "I, um..... I-I didn't know your family has a butler, Eli." She said, becoming a bit more lively with each passing minute of her conversation with you. In response, you looked back at the female Arachne and confessed, "....The truth is, Alma, is that my family's known to be among the Upper Class in society. It's due to my father's research into Cryogenics that we're able to have such luxuries, not that I'm bragging about it or anything like that."

Although you were glad that she was able to open up a little to you, Alma still seemed somewhat hesitant about something, which involved.....
15533222111211121121.title: Stirring Up A Conversation

choices: From there, you escorted Alma inside the building and into your home...
Unfortunately, another group of racists appeared....
155332221112111211211.content:
Of course, you noticed Alma's hesitation some, as you then calmly spoke to her and asked, "Something on your mind, Alma?" In confirmation, she nodded once or twice in response, where you then reassured her and said, "...It's okay, I'm not going to get mad at you or anything of the sort. So, what's on your mind?" Affirmed by your kind words, Alma then slowly spoke her thoughts and confessed, "I......I, um..... I want to know how you got your....your powers."

To be honest, you weren't expecting Alma to present such a personal topic for you quite so early. Then again, she witnessed what you were actually capable of with such superhuman abilities at your disposal. So, left with little to no choice on the matter, you spoke back toward Alma, displaying a bit of your power in the process, causing your right hand, wrist, and forearm to be coated in a layer of hardened ice, which made these crackling sounds while you flexed the fingers on your right hand.

From there, you calmly spoke toward the female Arachne sitting before you and explained, "....To be honest, Alma: I've never asked for this kind of power. It was thrusted upon me out of sheer accident. Remember when I told you that my father was researching Cryogenics?" In response, Alma nodded yes, where you then continued your explanation and said, "Well, he was personally researching into an untested form of Cryogenics, simply known as Cryostasis. It's where you can freeze someone who's very much alive, preserving them, and then thawing them out and reviving them at a later date. Originally, this is something that could only exist in science fiction. However, my father found a way to make such a concept a reality. However, when I was 6 years old and he took me to his lab as part of a "Take Your Kid To Work Day", my childish curiosity got the better of me. Somehow, I ended up being caught in the middle of my father's experiment, changing me into what I've now become. Of course, he turned off the experiment and rushed me to a hospital. Miraculously, I survived.....but I had changed as well. Originally, I used to have dark blonde hair and a pair of green eyes before the accident. But now, not so much, as you can see before you. I used to live in a city called Las Vegas in the United States, but due to the desert's hot temperatures, I couldn't stay conscious for long back then, which forced my family to move someplace with a more.....tolerable climate. But over the past 10 years, I learned how to control my powers, master them. After all, you saw what I was clearly capable of back when those bastards were harassing you."

From hearing of your detailed backstory, Alma now understood you a little more better than she previously thought. After all, you were being very truthful to her involving the origin of your ice powers, seeing as how you've saved her from that gang of racists from earlier. And yet, one thing still kept buzzing around in her mind: the motive, as in "Why would you do things like this?" . Those kinds of questions. So, Alma then spoke to you and asked, "But Eli.....W-Why would you behave like such a, um......such a....." "-A vigilante? .....Well, it's because neither the police or the Cultural Exchange Security Squad can't seem to lift a damn finger to stop the harassment and stigma that you and the rest of your fellow monsters are forced to endure. By the time the authorities DO get off their lazy asses and try to stop crap like this, the damage has already been done. Some people have the tendency to fear or outright hate those who are different. This happened with the African Americans during the Civil Rights movement in the 1950s & 1960s, and now the exact same thing is happening with the coexistence of monsters, despite there being laws against such acts of violence." You explained, revealing the motivation behind your career as a vigilante, just as the two of you felt the limousine come to a full stop, parking next to a a large 12-story building, indicating that you've arrived home.

"Well, looks like we're here." You said, exiting out of the limo. From there, you held out your hand to assist Alma in exiting the vehicle, pulling her carefully out the door and onto the sidewalk. From there, as Alma still clung to her suitcase, you gently shut the door behind her, prompting Adrian to drive the limousine into the underground parking garage nearby, disappearing from your sight in the process.
155332221112111211211.title: The Origin Of Your Powers

choices: Then, you entered your father's workshop to pay Adam a visit.
Along the way, you accidentally bumped into your sister, Julie.
Actually, something else happened along the way there.....
1553322211121112112111.content:
Of course, you could tell that Alma already had butterflies in her stomach upon arriving here at the hotel. So in an effort to ease the internal tension within her, you gently held Alma's left hand in reassurance, as you then looked at her with a calm and compassionate look on your face and said, "....It's okay, Alma. I'm not gonna let anything bad happen to you. Come on, let's head inside." In reaction, Alma couldn't help but somewhat blush, almost as if you're the one person who has shown her kindness since she first arrived here in Tokyo.

Feeling a little more at ease, you gently guided the timid Arachne inside the hotel, treading through the spacious lobby and approached one of the private elevators. Fortunately, this place was one of the handful of hotels/apartment complexes that was designed for both humans and monsters in mind. Upon approaching the elevator doors, you pulled out a green and white keycard, inserted it into the nearby scanner, where it then flashed green in approval, causing the elevator doors to open, revealing a spacious 9 by 9 foot elevator in front of both you and Alma.

From there, you carefully led Alma inside the elevator, where the doors slowly closed simultaneously, shortly after you pressed an elevator button that led all the way up to the 12th floor, where your family's penthouse estate was located. Though, you couldn't blame Alma for being nervous. After all, aside from you and Adrian, Alma was only moments away from meeting her host family for the very first time.

Once the elevator finally reached the top floor and the doors opened in unison, you saw that your mother was currently setting up some Halloween decorations. After all, it was the 3rd week of September, and your mother was known to set up holiday decorations earlier than most people would normally do. "Mom, I'm home!" You exclaimed, causing your mother to turn around, noticing both you and Alma. From there, she quickly climbed down the ladder to greet you, where she then wrapped her arms around you in the process, just as you let go of Alma's hand for a second there, as your mother then spoke to you and said, "Welcome home, honey."

Shortly after that, your mother released her embrace on you, as she then turned to confront Alma, who became a little nervous. However, your mother reassured the shy Arachne, as she looked at Alma and said, "So, you must be Alma Spinnerette? Welcome to the Prentiss household. I'm terribly sorry for what you had to endure, Ms. Smith told us what happened and how my son saved you."

In response, Alma couldn't help but blush in embarrassment and hesitation. After all, your mother was doting over her like she was a little girl. However, you interrupted your mother and answered, "Uh, Mom.....I think that's enough. After all, you're making her nervous enough as it is." "Oops! My bad. But don't worry, Alma, I won't bite." Your mother replied, comforting Alma some, along with reassuring the timid Arachne in an attempt to make her feel right at home with some difficulty.

From there, as she gently guided Alma toward the direction of your room, you then looked back at your mother and asked, "So, where's Adam?" In hindsight, Adam was the name of your older brother, who was currently 20 years of age, while your sister, Julie, was 15 years of age, and your younger brother, Connor, was 10 years old. Of course, in response, your mother turned her head to look at you and answered, "Adam is currently in your father's workshop, Elijah. I'm not sure why, though."

"Okay, thanks." You replied, now knowing where your older brother was currently located. Obviously, you knew what exactly Adam was doing in your father's workshop. Ever since you began your vigilante career, Adam's been your go-to expert on building gadgets for you, along with providing useful information during your vigilantism. In other words, he had become the Oracle to your Bruce Wayne/Batman.
1553322211121112112111.title: Home Sweet Home

choices: All about sending a message, that monsters & humans can never co-exist.
About the violence, attacking any monster & monster sympathizers.
Actually, you thought that these bombings were leading to something bigger....
15533222111211121121111.content:
From there, you decided to pay your older brother a visit, letting him know that you've returned home unharmed, as you then approached a large titanium door, which was the entrance that led to your father's workshop. Upon turning the large circular valve that acted like a highly-secure doorknob, you forcefully pulled the large door open, just enough for you to proceed inside the large workshop.

Upon entering, you heard music blasting throughout the workshop. Knowing your brother, Adam was known to listen to music while he was working on some new gadgets. However, if there was a song he absolutely loved, he could not help but sing along with the lyrics, as he sung, "Consentes Dei Juno Jupiter Minerva Apollo Mars Ceres, Mercurius Diana Bacchus Vulcanus Pluto Vesta Venus! Madoromi no fuchi de, mabuta ni tayutau. Musou no kami wa yuuga ni hohoemi shi o kudashi, Jikuu o suberu inga no kusari wa karamidasu! Kami no ataeshi kuusou Program! Saa eins zwei drei! Kasanariau. Saa eins zwei drei! Shi o kawashite. Shoumetsu no yuugi ni, kogareru kiseki o ubau! SURVIVAL GAAAAAME!!"

Although you couldn't help but be impressed by your brother's ability to keep up with the song's pace, not to mention having a superb set of vocal chords made for singing. However, you needed to talk to him, so you spoke toward your brother and exclaimed, "Hey Adam!!" As if on cue, Adam instantly stopped singing, recognizing your voice in the process. From there, he turned down the volume on his iPod stereo set, so he could hear you more easily, as he then approached you, where the two of you bumped fists in a friendly gesture and he said, "Good to see you're still in one piece, bro." "Same here, Adam. Same here. So, what exactly were you singing to, anyway?" You asked, still somewhat curious about what that song was you just heard moments ago.

"Oh that? That, my younger brother, was Kuusou Mesorogiwi, by Yousei Teikoku and Yui Itsuki. Apparently, it was used as the opening song for one of my favorite anime, Mirai Nikki. Pretty cool, huh?" Adam explained, as he slicked his jet black hair some, so it would spike up a little more. However, it was then you noticed what exactly your brother was working on: A voice modulator, which was designed to alter one's voice to disguise themselves from being identified and/or exposed by anyone.

"I'm guessing you made that for me, right?" You asked, prompting your brother to nod in confirmation, as he then put the voice modulator against his Adam's Apple and throat, causing his voice to sound significantly deeper than his original voice, where he then spoke to you and answered, "Damn straight, Eli." ".....Wow. Didn't know your voice can sound so deep." You remarked, noticing how deep Adam's voice sounded just now thanks to the voice modulator.

Shortly after that little demonstration, Adam carefully placed the voice modulator back on the workshop countertop where he grabbed it from. Then, you spoke toward Adam once more and said, "So, I'm guessing you've already heard the news that we've got an Arachne staying with us." "Mm-hmm! I did. You can say I saw the whole thing that went down back in that street market thanks to me hacking into the city's CCTV cameras." Adam replied, confessing that he hacked into the city's surveillance system to use as his eyes and ears throughout Tokyo.

Knowing your brother, he wasn't just a good inventor, Adam also had become quite the expert hacker these days, allowing him to discreetly access Tokyo's municipal systems with ease, whether it was classified information or just the nearby security cameras. Either way, Adam had become an invaluable asset in your vigilante career. "I take it you saw what happened and know who those assholes were then, Adam?" You said, approaching the various sets of monitors gathered around multiple keyboards. In a way, this was your very own Batcomputer.....minus the Batcave, of course.

"Of course, obviously. I've managed to identify each individual member of that gang of *ahem* "assholes" you've taken down. However, there's one member of this group that caught my attention. Here, see for yourself." Adam answered, sitting in the chair that faced the Batcomputer ripoff, typing away on the keyboard with rapid succession, pulling up various digital police files on each member of that gang of racists. However, what Adam wanted to show you was the dossier he put together on a certain racist that you instantly recognized, as you spoke up and said, "Hey, I recognize him: he was the prick that stole Alma's documents when I interrogated him!"

"That's right, brother. Glad to see your memory is intact. Anyway, the guy who stole those documents was identified as Yuichi Gasai. From what I can dig up, he's a very active member of The Sons of Susanoo, an anti-Monster faction known for their extremist views that has become borderline terrorism lately. Recently, this group has claimed responsibility of several bomb attacks upon a Supermarket in Ginza, a Maid Café in Shibuya, an Arcade Center in Akihabara, and the most recent of these attacks, a Clothing Store within the Tsubaki Shopping Centre in Shinjuku." Adam thoroughly explained, leaving no detail undiscovered in his report to you about the Sons of Susanoo faction.

Then again, these scumbags did name their group after the legendary warrior Susanoo, who was best known for defeating the 8-headed serpent Yamato-No-Oorochi. However, you had a feeling that this group didn't exactly set up bombs in these random places just for laughs, as you crossed your arms in the process where you then spoke toward your older brother and said, "I assume that these places have been extensively renovated to suit both Humans and Monsters?"
